《关于改进完善专题询问工作的若干意见》	《关于改进完善专题询问工作的若干意见》       【英】<h1>A Number of Opinions on the Improvement of the Work of Special Consultations</h1>译文来源     <p>Assessment Report on the Implementation of the National Human Rights Action Plan of China (2012-2015)</p>定义来源     <p>《国家人权行动计划（2012-2015年）》实施评估报告</p>例句     <p>1. 2014年全国人大常委会办公厅制定《关于改进完善专题询问工作的若干意见》，将涉及改革难度大、存在问题多、社会关注度高、关系群众切身利益的报告议案确定为专题询问的选题，执法检查、听取报告、专题询问三种监督形式有机结合。</p><p>1. In 2014, the General Office of the NPC Standing Committee formulated A Number of Opinions on the Improvement of the Work of Special Consultations, listing reports and bills that involve reform of a high rate of difficulty, reflect numerous problems, draw high degrees of public attention, and concern the immediate interests of the general public as topics of special consultation, and organically combining the three forms of supervision, law-enforcement inspection, report hearing and special consultation.</p>
《关于新形势下加强基层工会建设的意见》	《关于新形势下加强基层工会建设的意见》       【英】<h1>the Opinions on Strengthening the Construction of Grassroots Trade Unions under New Situations</h1>译文来源     <p>Assessment Report on the Implementation of the National Human Rights Action Plan of China (2012-2015)</p>定义来源     <p>《国家人权行动计划（2012-2015年）》实施评估报告</p>例句     <p>1. 中华全国总工会发布《关于新形势下加强基层工会建设的意见》《基层组织建设工作规划（2014－2018年）》，扩大工会组织有效覆盖。截至</p><p>1.  The All-China Federation of Trade Unions issued the Opinions on Strengthening the Construction of Grassroots Trade Unions under New Situations and the Plan of Work on the Construction of Grassroots Organizations (2014-2018), to expand the effective coverage of trade unions.</p>
《关于统一城乡中小学教职工编制标准的通知》	《关于统一城乡中小学教职工编制标准的通知》       【英】<h1>a circular on unifying the standards of staffing in urban and rural primary and secondary schools</h1>译文来源     <p>Assessment Report on the Implementation of the National Human Rights Action Plan of China (2012-2015)</p>定义来源     <p>《国家人权行动计划（2012-2015年）》实施评估报告</p>例句     <p>1. 2014年11月，有关部门联合印发《关于统一城乡中小学教职工编制标准的通知》，将县镇、农村中小学教职工编制标准统一到城市标准，并向农村边远贫困地区倾斜。</p><p>1. In November 2014, the government departments concerned jointly issued a circular on unifying the standards of staffing in urban and rural primary and secondary schools, which made the standards of staffing for primary and secondary schools in rural counties and townships accord with those of their counterparts in cities, with a preferential treatment given to remote and poor regions.</p>
《关于进一步加强国家安全生产应急平台体系建设的意见》	《关于进一步加强国家安全生产应急平台体系建设的意见》       【英】<h1>Opinions on Further Enhancing the Construction of the System of National Work Safety Emergency Platforms</h1>译文来源     <p>Assessment Report on the Implementation of the National Human Rights Action Plan of China (2012-2015)</p>定义来源     <p>《国家人权行动计划（2012-2015年）》实施评估报告</p>例句     <p>1. 国家安全生产监督管理总局发布《关于进一步加强国家安全生产应急平台体系建设的意见》，国家和20个省（区、市）、部分市、重点县及高危行业大型企业分别建立安全生产应急平台，实现国家平台与13个省级应急平台、7支国家矿山应急救援队应急平台的互联互通。</p><p>1. The State Administration of Work Safety issued Opinions on Further Enhancing the Construction of the System of National Work Safety Emergency Platforms. The central government, 20 provinces (autonomous regions and municipalities directly under the central government), some cities, major counties and large enterprises in high-risk industries set up separate work safety platforms. Communication and connectivity were established among the platforms of the central government, 13 provincial regions and 7 national mine emergency rescue teams.</p>
《关于进一步加强西部地区人才队伍建设的意见》	《关于进一步加强西部地区人才队伍建设的意见》       【英】<h1>the Opinions on Strengthening Human Resources Development in Western China</h1>译文来源     <p>China’s Human Resources 2010</p>定义来源     <p>中国的人力资源状况 2010</p>例句     <p>1. 为加强西部地区人才开发，中国政府制定《关于进一步加强西部地区人才队伍建设的意见》，实施新疆、西藏少数民族科技骨干和青海三江源地区专业技术人才培养计划。2009年共培养2888名少数民族科技骨干人才和急需专业技术人才。</p><p>1. To promote human resources development in Western China, the Chinese government issued the Opinions on Strengthening Human Resources Development in Western China and carried out a training plan for the backbone personnel in the scientific and techno-logical field in the Xinjiang Uygur and Tibet autonomous regions, and for professionals in the Sanjiangyuan area of Qinghai Province. In 2009 China trained 2,888 backbone scientific and technical personnel and much-needed professionals of ethnic-minority groups.</p>
《关于进一步鼓励外商投资勘查开采非油气矿产资源的若干意见》	《关于进一步鼓励外商投资勘查开采非油气矿产资源的若干意见》       【英】<h1>the Opinions on Further Encouraging Foreign Investment in Exploring and Exploiting Non-oil-and-gas Mineral Resources</h1>译文来源     <p>China's Energy Conditions and Policies 2012</p>定义来源     <p>中国的能源状况与政策 2012</p>例句     <p>1. 2000年，中国发布了《关于进一步鼓励外商投资勘查开采非油气矿产资源的若干意见》，进一步开放非油气资源的探矿权、采矿权市场。</p><p>1. In 2000, China promulgated the Opinions on Further Encouraging Foreign Investment in Exploring and Exploiting Non-oil-and-gas Mineral Resources, further opening up its market in this regard. China allows foreign investors, either by themselves or in collaboration with Chinese counterparts, to conduct risk exploration on its territory.</p>
《农业法》	《农业法》       【英】<h1>the Agriculture Law</h1>译文来源     <p>The Grain Issue in China 1996</p>定义来源     <p>中国的粮食问题 1996</p>例句     <p>1. 多年来，中国制定和完善了《农业法》、《土地管理法》、《水土保持法》等一系列法律法规，抑制了耕地面积锐减势头，使耕地净减少面积由九十年代前的年均30多万公顷，下降到目前的不足20万公顷。</p><p>1. Over the years, certain laws and regulations have been worked out and perfected, including the Agriculture Law, Land Management Law and Water and Soil Conservation Law. The result has been an alleviation in the trend of rapid reduction of cultivated land, the net area of cultivated land reduction having dropped to less than 200,000 ha from the annual average of 300,000 ha before the 1990s.</p>
《准予就业最低年龄公约》	《准予就业最低年龄公约》       【英】<h1>Convention on the Minimum Age for Admission to Employment</h1>译文来源     <p>China’s Human Resources 2010</p>定义来源     <p>中国的人力资源状况 2010</p>例句     <p>1. 中国政府结合本国经济社会发展实际，先后批准了《男女同工同酬公约》、《准予就业最低年龄公约》、《消除最恶劣形式童工公约》、《消除就业和职业歧视公约》等25个国际劳工公约，并积极实施有关公约。</p><p>1. The Chinese government, in line with its own economic and social development, has ratified 25 international labor conventions, such as the Convention Concerning Equal Remuneration for Men and Women Workers for Work of Equal Value, Convention on the Minimum Age for Admission to Employment, Convention on the Elimination of the Worst Forms of Child Labor, and Convention Concerning Discrimination in Respect of Employment and Occupation, and has implemented these conventions.</p>
《刑法》	《刑法》       【英】<h1>the Criminal Law</h1>译文来源     <p>China's Efforts and Achievements in Promoting the Rule of Law 2013</p>定义来源     <p>中国的法治建设 2013</p>例句     <p>1. 在发展社会主义民主、健全社会主义法制的基本方针指引下，现行宪法以及《刑法》、《刑事诉讼法》、《民事诉讼法》、《民法通则》、《行政诉讼法》等一批基本法律出台，中国的法治建设进入了全新发展阶段。</p><p>1. Under the guidance of the basic principle of developing socialist democracy and improving the socialist legal system, China promulgated the present Constitution and basic laws, such as the Criminal Law, Criminal Procedure Law, Civil Procedure Law, General Principles of the Civil Law and Administrative Procedure Law, ushering in a new development stage of the rule of law.</p>
《前海深港现代服务业合作区总体发展规划》	《前海深港现代服务业合作区总体发展规划》       【英】<h1>the Overall Development Plan for the Qianhai Shenzhen-Hong Kong Modern Service Industry Cooperation Zone</h1>译文来源     <p>The Practice of the “One Country, Two Systems” Policy in the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region</p>定义来源     <p>“一国两制”在香港特别行政区的实践</p>例句     <p>1. 中央政府批准设立粤港合作联席会议、泛珠三角区域合作与发展论坛。批准实施《珠江三角洲地区改革发展规划纲要（2008-2020年）》、《横琴总体发展规划》、《前海深港现代服务业合作区总体发展规划》、《广州南沙新区发展规划》，批准广东省与香港特别行政区签署《粤港合作框架协议》，明确粤港合作的重点领域，构建珠海横琴新区、深圳前海深港现代服务业合作区、广州南沙新区三大合作平台，促进粤港两地共同打造更具综合竞争力的世界级城市群和世界先进制造业、先进服务业基地。</p><p>1. The central government has endorsed the establishment of the Hong Kong-Guangdong Cooperation Joint Conference, and the Pan-Pearl River Delta Regional Cooperation and Development Forum. It approved the implementation of the Outline of the Plan for the Reform and Development of the Pearl River Delta (2008-2020), the Overall Development Plan of Hengqin, the Overall Development Plan for the Qianhai Shenzhen-Hong Kong Modern Service Industry Cooperation Zone, and the Development Plan for the Nansha New District of Guangzhou, and approved the signing by Guangdong with the HKSAR of the Framework Agreement on Hong Kong-Guangdong Cooperation, which identifies the three key areas of cooperation, namely, building the Hengqin New District of Zhuhai, the Qianhai Shenzhen-Hong Kong Modern Service Industry Cooperation Zone and the Nansha New District of Guangzhou, the central government has urged Guangdong and Hong Kong to work together to build more competitive world-class urban cluster with cutting-edge manufacturing and service industries.</p>
《劳动保障监察条例》	《劳动保障监察条例》       【英】<h1>the Regulations on Supervision of Labor Security</h1>译文来源     <p>Assessment Report on the Implementation of the National Human Rights Action Plan of China (2012-2015)</p>定义来源     <p>《国家人权行动计划（2012-2015年）》实施评估报告</p>例句     <p>1. 工会参与《劳动保障监察条例》修改研究工作。</p><p>1. Trade unions involved themselves in the study of the revising of the Regulations on Supervision of Labor Security.</p>
《劳动合同法》	《劳动合同法》       【英】<h1>Law on Labor Contracts</h1>译文来源     <p>China’s Foreign Trade 2011</p>定义来源     <p>中国的对外贸易 2011</p>例句     <p>1. 2008年新的《劳动合同法》及其实施条例施行以来，进出口企业普遍建立了“五险一金”(养老保险、医疗保险、失业保险、工伤保险、生育保险和住房公积金)制度。</p><p>1. Since the new Law on Labor Contracts and its implementation regulations took effect in 2008, import and export enterprises have established the system of "five insurances" (old-age insurance, medical insurance, unemployment insurance, work injury insurance and maternity insurance), as well as a housing fund.</p>
《北京倡议》	《北京倡议》       【英】<h1>the Beijing Initiative</h1>译文来源     <p>China’s Human Resources 2010</p>定义来源     <p>中国的人力资源状况 2010</p>例句     <p>1. 2001年，中国成功举办亚太经合组织人力资源能力建设高峰会议，通过了《北京倡议》。2010年9月，第五届亚太经合组织人力资源开发部长级会议在北京举行，为亚太各经济体讨论金融危机后的就业、人力资源开发等提供重要平台。</p><p>1. In 2001 China hosted the APEC High-level Meeting on Human Capacity Building, and adopted the Beijing Initiative. In September 2010 the 5th APEC Ministerial Meet-ing on Human Resources Development will be held in Beijing, serving as an important platform for Asia-Pacific economies to discuss issues such as employment after the financial crisis and human resources development.</p>
《北京宣言》	《北京宣言》       【英】<h1>the Beijing Declaration</h1>译文来源     <p>China’s Human Resources 2010</p>定义来源     <p>中国的人力资源状况 2010</p>例句     <p>1. 中国1994年加入国际社会保障协会成为正式会员。2004年第28届国际社会保障协会全球大会在北京召开，通过了《北京宣言》。截至2009年底，中国政府人力资源和社会保障部门已经与80多个国家和一些重要的国际组织建立了合作伙伴关系。</p><p>1. China became a full member of the International Social Security Association (ISSA) in 1994, and held the 28th ISSA International Conference in Beijing in 2004, at which the Beijing Declaration was adopted. By the end of 2009, human resources and social security departments of the Chinese government had established cooperative partnership relations with more than 80 countries and some important international organizations.</p>
《医疗器械生产监督管理办法》	《医疗器械生产监督管理办法》       【英】<h1>the Provisions for the Supervision and Management of Medical Device Production</h1>译文来源     <p>Assessment Report on the Implementation of the National Human Rights Action Plan of China (2012-2015)</p>定义来源     <p>《国家人权行动计划（2012-2015年）》实施评估报告</p>例句     <p>1. 国务院修改《医疗器械监督管理条例》，国家食品药品监督管理总局审核发布《医疗器械生产监督管理办法》《医疗器械经营监督管理办法》《药品经营质量管理规范》《药品医疗器械飞行检查管理办法》等一系列规章。</p><p>1. The State Council also revised the Regulations for the Supervision and Administration of Medical Devices. The China Food and Drug Administration has reviewed and issued a series of regulations including the Provisions for the Supervision and Management of Medical Device Production, the Provisions for the Supervision and Management of Medical Device Operation, the Regulations on the Quality of Operation of Pharmaceutical Products and the Provisions for the Flight Check of Pharmaceutical Products and Medical Devices.</p>
《医疗器械监督管理条例》	《医疗器械监督管理条例》       【英】<h1>the Regulations for the Supervision and Administration of Medical Devices</h1>译文来源     <p>Assessment Report on the Implementation of the National Human Rights Action Plan of China (2012-2015)</p>定义来源     <p>《国家人权行动计划（2012-2015年）》实施评估报告</p>例句     <p>1. 国务院修改《医疗器械监督管理条例》，国家食品药品监督管理总局审核发布《医疗器械生产监督管理办法》《医疗器械经营监督管理办法》《药品经营质量管理规范》《药品医疗器械飞行检查管理办法》等一系列规章。</p><p>1. The State Council also revised the Regulations for the Supervision and Administration of Medical Devices. The China Food and Drug Administration has reviewed and issued a series of regulations including the Provisions for the Supervision and Management of Medical Device Production, the Provisions for the Supervision and Management of Medical Device Operation, the Regulations on the Quality of Operation of Pharmaceutical Products and the Provisions for the Flight Check of Pharmaceutical Products and Medical Devices.</p>
《医疗器械经营监督管理办法》	《医疗器械经营监督管理办法》       【英】<h1>the Provisions for the Supervision and Management of Medical Device Operation</h1>译文来源     <p>Assessment Report on the Implementation of the National Human Rights Action Plan of China (2012-2015)</p>定义来源     <p>《国家人权行动计划（2012-2015年）》实施评估报告</p>例句     <p>1. 国务院修改《医疗器械监督管理条例》，国家食品药品监督管理总局审核发布《医疗器械生产监督管理办法》《医疗器械经营监督管理办法》《药品经营质量管理规范》《药品医疗器械飞行检查管理办法》等一系列规章。</p><p>1. The State Council also revised the Regulations for the Supervision and Administration of Medical Devices. The China Food and Drug Administration has reviewed and issued a series of regulations including the Provisions for the Supervision and Management of Medical Device Production, the Provisions for the Supervision and Management of Medical Device Operation, the Regulations on the Quality of Operation of Pharmaceutical Products and the Provisions for the Flight Check of Pharmaceutical Products and Medical Devices.</p>
《十二五综合交通运输体系规划》	《“十二五”综合交通运输体系规划》
《南南合作三方协议》	《南南合作三方协议》       【英】<h1>the South-South Tripartite Agreement</h1>译文来源     <p>China-Africa Economic and Trade Cooperation 2010</p>定义来源     <p>《中国与非洲的经贸合作》2010</p>例句     <p>1. 中国还和联合国粮农组织合作，与毛里塔尼亚、加纳、埃塞俄比亚、加蓬、塞拉利昂、马里、尼日利亚等国分别签署了《南南合作三方协议》，累计向上述国家派出６００多名中国农业专家和技术人员。</p><p>1. China also cooperated with the United Nations Food and Agriculture Organization, and signed the South-South Tripartite Agreement with Mauritania, Ghana, Ethiopia, Gabon, Sierra Leone, Mali and Nigeria, sending to these countries over 600 Chinese agricultural experts and technicians.</p>
《可再生能源中长期发展规划》	《可再生能源中长期发展规划》       【英】<h1>the Medium- and Long-term Program for Renewable Energy Development</h1>译文来源     <p>China's Energy Conditions and Policies 2012</p>定义来源     <p>中国的能源状况与政策 2012</p>例句     <p>1. 发布了《可再生能源中长期发展规划》，提出到2010年使可再生能源消费量达到能源消费总量的10%，到2020年达到15%的发展目标。</p><p>1. It has released the Medium- and Long-term Program for Renewable Energy Development, putting forward the goal of increasing renewable energy consumption to 10 percent of the total energy consumption by 2010 and 15 percent by 2020.</p>
《可再生能源法》	《可再生能源法》       【英】<h1>the Renewable Energy Law</h1>译文来源     <p>China's Energy Conditions and Policies 2012</p>定义来源     <p>中国的能源状况与政策 2012</p>例句     <p>1. 中国高度重视并积极推进能源法律制度建设，《清洁生产促进法》、《可再生能源法》已经颁布实施，配套政策措施陆续出台；修订后的《节约能源法》已经公布；《能源法》、《循环经济法》、《石油天然气管道保护法》及《建筑节能条例》正在抓紧制订；《矿产资源法》、《煤炭法》和《电力法》正在抓紧修订。</p><p>1. China sets great store by and actively advances the construction of the energy legal system. China has enacted and put in force the Clean Production Promotion Law and Renewable Energy Law, and has issued a series of supporting policies and measures. The amended Energy Conservation Law has been promulgated. The Energy Law, Circular Economy Law, Law on the Protection of Oil and Natural Gas Pipelines and Regulations on Energy Conservation of Buildings are being formulated. The Mineral Resources Law, Coal Industry Law, and Electric Power Law are being revised.</p>
《国务院关于加强节能工作的决定》	《国务院关于加强节能工作的决定》       【英】<h1>the Decision of the State Council on Strengthening Energy-conservation Work</h1>译文来源     <p>China's Energy Conditions and Policies 2012</p>定义来源     <p>中国的能源状况与政策 2012</p>例句     <p>1. 为继续深入推进能源节约，中国政府进一步提出把节约资源作为基本国策，发布了《国务院关于加强节能工作的决定》。</p><p>1. To further promote energy conservation, the Chinese government made conservation of resources a basic state policy, and issued the Decision of the State Council on Strengthening Energy-conservation Work.</p>
《国家中长期教育改革和发展规划纲要(2010－2020年)》	《国家中长期教育改革和发展规划纲要(2010－2020年)》       【英】<h1>the Outline of the State Medium- and Long-term Program on Education Reform and Development (2010-2020)</h1>译文来源     <p>Assessment Report on the Implementation of the National Human Rights Action Plan of China (2012-2015)</p>定义来源     <p>《国家人权行动计划（2012-2015年）》实施评估报告</p>例句     <p>1. 《国家中长期教育改革和发展规划纲要(2010－2020年)》稳步落实。</p><p>1. The Outline of the State Medium- and Long-term Program on Education Reform and Development (2010-2020) has been steadily implemented.</p>
《国家中长期科学和技术发展规划纲要》	《国家中长期科学和技术发展规划纲要》       【英】<h1>the Outline of the National Plan for Medium- and Long-term Scientific and Technological Development (2006-2010)</h1>译文来源     <p>China's Energy Conditions and Policies 2012</p>定义来源     <p>中国的能源状况与政策 2012</p>例句     <p>1. 2005年，中国政府制定了《国家中长期科学和技术发展规划纲要》，把能源技术放在优先发展位置，按照自主创新、重点跨越、支撑发展、引领未来的方针，加快推进能源技术进步，努力为能源的可持续发展提供技术支撑。</p><p>1. The Chinese government promulgated the Outline of the National Plan for Medium- and Long-term Scientific and Technological Development (2006-2010) in 2005, which gives top priority to the development of energy technologies, and, in line with the principle of making independent innovations and leapfrogging development in key fields, shoring up the economy and keeping in step with leading trends, stresses accelerating progress of energy technologies and strives to provide technological support for the sustainable energy development.</p>
《国家知识产权战略纲要》	《国家知识产权战略纲要》       【英】<h1>the Outline of the National Intellectual Property Strategy</h1>译文来源     <p>China’s Foreign Trade 2011</p>定义来源     <p>中国的对外贸易 2011</p>例句     <p>1. 2008年，中国制定了《国家知识产权战略纲要》，把保护知识产权提升到国家战略的高度加以推进。2006年至2011年，中国连续6年颁布《中国保护知识产权行动计划》，实施了包括立法、执法、教育培训、文化宣传和对外交流等多个领域的1000多项具体措施。</p><p>1. In 2008 China promulgated the Outline of the National Intellectual Property Strategy, making IPR protection a national strategy. From 2006 to 2011, China published the Action Plan on Intellectual Property Protection for six consecutive years, putting in place over 1,000 concrete measures covering the fields of legislation, law enforcement, education and training, cultural communication and exchanges with the outside world.</p>
《国有文化企事业单位职工代表大会实施办法（暂行）》	《国有文化企事业单位职工代表大会实施办法（暂行）》       【英】<h1>Measures of Implementation on Workers' Congresses in State-owned Cultural Units, Enterprises and Institutions (Temporary)</h1>译文来源     <p>Assessment Report on the Implementation of the National Human Rights Action Plan of China (2012-2015)</p>定义来源     <p>《国家人权行动计划（2012-2015年）》实施评估报告</p>例句     <p>1. 有关部门制定《国有文化企事业单位职工代表大会实施办法（暂行）》。</p><p>1.  Relevant departments have formulated Measures of Implementation on Workers' Congresses in State-owned Cultural Units, Enterprises and Institutions (Temporary).</p>
《国民经济和社会发展第十三个五年规划纲要》	《国民经济和社会发展第十三个五年规划纲要》       【英】<h1>the 13th Five-Year Plan for Economic and Social Development</h1>译文来源     <p>Report on the Work of the Government 2016</p>定义来源     <p>2016政府工作报告</p>例句     <p>1. 根据《中共中央关于制定国民经济和社会发展第十三个五年规划的建议》，国务院编制了《国民经济和社会发展第十三个五年规划纲要（草案）》，提交大会审查。</p><p>1. On the basis of the CPC Central Committee Recommendations for the 13th Five-Year Plan for Economic and Social Development, the State Council has drawn up the draft of the 13th Five-Year Plan for Economic and Social Development and submitted it to this session for your review and approval.</p>
《国民经济和社会发展第十二个五年规划纲要（草案）》	《国民经济和社会发展第十二个五年规划纲要（草案）》       【英】<h1>the Twelfth Five-Year Plan for National Economic and Social Development (draft)</h1>译文来源     <p>Report on the Work of the Government 2011</p>定义来源     <p>2011 政府工作报告</p>例句     <p>1. 根据《中共中央关于制定国民经济和社会发展第十二个五年规划的建议》，我们编制了《国民经济和社会发展第十二个五年规划纲要（草案）》，提交大会审议。</p><p>1. We have drawn up the Twelfth Five-Year Plan for National Economic and Social Development (draft) in accordance with the Proposal of the CPC Central Committee for Formulating the Twelfth Five-Year Plan for National Economic and Social Development and submitted it to you for your deliberation and approval.</p>
《土地管理法》	《土地管理法》       【英】<h1>the Land Management Law</h1>译文来源     <p>The Grain Issue in China 1996</p>定义来源     <p>中国的粮食问题 1996</p>例句     <p>1. 多年来，中国制定和完善了《农业法》、《土地管理法》、《水土保持法》等一系列法律法规，抑制了耕地面积锐减势头，使耕地净减少面积由九十年代前的年均30多万公顷，下降到目前的不足20万公顷。</p><p>1. Over the years, certain laws and regulations have been worked out and perfected, including the Agriculture Law, Land Management Law and Water and Soil Conservation Law. The result has been an alleviation in the trend of rapid reduction of cultivated land, the net area of cultivated land reduction having dropped to less than 200,000 ha from the annual average of 300,000 ha before the 1990s.</p>
《基层组织建设工作规划（2014－2018年）》	《基层组织建设工作规划（2014－2018年）》       【英】<h1>the Plan of Work on the Construction of Grassroots Organizations (2014-2018)</h1>译文来源     <p>Assessment Report on the Implementation of the National Human Rights Action Plan of China (2012-2015)</p>定义来源     <p>《国家人权行动计划（2012-2015年）》实施评估报告</p>例句     <p>1. 中华全国总工会发布《关于新形势下加强基层工会建设的意见》《基层组织建设工作规划（2014－2018年）》，扩大工会组织有效覆盖。截至</p><p>1.  The All-China Federation of Trade Unions issued the Opinions on Strengthening the Construction of Grassroots Trade Unions under New Situations and the Plan of Work on the Construction of Grassroots Organizations (2014-2018), to expand the effective coverage of trade unions.</p>
《外商投资产业指导目录》	《外商投资产业指导目录》       【英】<h1>the Catalogue of Industrial Guidance for Foreign Investment</h1>译文来源     <p>China's Energy Conditions and Policies 2012</p>定义来源     <p>中国的能源状况与政策 2012</p>例句     <p>1. 2002年制定了《指导外商投资方向规定》，2004年修订了《外商投资产业指导目录》和《中西部地区外商投资优势产业目录》，鼓励外商投资能源及相关的采掘、生产、供应及运输领域，鼓励投资设备制造产业，鼓励外商投资中西部地区能源产业。</p><p>1. In 2002, China formulated the Regulations for the Guidance of Foreign Investment Orientation, and revised the Catalogue of Industrial Guidance for Foreign Investment and the Catalogue of Advantageous Industries for Foreign Investment in the Central and Western Regions in 2004, in order to encourage foreign investment in the energy sector, including energy and energy-related exploitation, production, supply, transportation and energy equipment production, as well as in the energy sector of the central and western regions.</p>
《外资企业法》	《外资企业法》       【英】<h1>Law on Foreign Capital Enterprises</h1>译文来源     <p>China's Energy Conditions and Policies 2012</p>定义来源     <p>中国的能源状况与政策 2012</p>例句     <p>1. 中国积极完善对外开放的法律政策，先后颁布了《中外合资经营企业法》、《中外合作经营企业法》和《外资企业法》，努力营造公平、开放的外商投资环境。</p><p>1. China has made active efforts to improve laws and policies related to its opening-up, promulgating in succession the Law on Sino-foreign Equity Joint Ventures, Law on Sino-foreign Cooperative Joint Ventures and Law on Foreign Capital Enterprises to create a fair and open environment for foreign investment.</p>
《大气污染防治行动计划》	《大气污染防治行动计划》       【英】<h1>the Action Plan on Air Pollution Prevention and Control</h1>译文来源     <p>Assessment Report on the Implementation of the National Human Rights Action Plan of China (2012-2015)</p>定义来源     <p>《国家人权行动计划（2012-2015年）》实施评估报告</p>例句     <p>1. 2013年9月，国务院印发《大气污染防治行动计划》，明确了10条35项综合治理措施，重点治理细颗粒物（PM2.5）和可吸入颗粒物（PM10）。</p><p>1.  In September 2013, the State Council distributed the Action Plan on Air Pollution Prevention and Control, in which it clarified comprehensive treatment measures composed of 10 articles and 35 items, focusing on fine particulate matter (PM2.5) and inhalable particles (PM10).</p>
《女职工劳动保护特别规定》	《女职工劳动保护特别规定》       【英】<h1>the Special Rules on the Labor Protection of Female Employees</h1>译文来源     <p>Assessment Report on the Implementation of the National Human Rights Action Plan of China (2012-2015)</p>定义来源     <p>《国家人权行动计划（2012-2015年）》实施评估报告</p>例句     <p>1. 2012年4月，国务院颁布实施《女职工劳动保护特别规定》，修改完善适用范围、禁忌劳动范围等内容，将法定产假时间延长到98天。</p><p>1. In April 2012, the State Council promulgated the Special Rules on the Labor Protection of Female Employees, revising and improving some items including the scope of application and range of forbidden labor, as well as extending statutory maternity leave to 98 days.</p>
《女职工劳动保护规定》	《女职工劳动保护规定》       【英】<h1>Regulations Concerning the Labor Protection of Female Staff and Workers</h1>译文来源     <p>China’s Human Resources 2010</p>定义来源     <p>中国的人力资源状况 2010</p>例句     <p>1. 1988年以来，颁布了《中华人民共和国残疾人保障法》、《中华人民共和国妇女权益保障法》、《中华人民共和国未成年人保护法》和《女职工劳动保护规定》、《禁止使用童工规定》、《残疾人就业条例》等法律和行政法规。《就业促进法》专门设立了“公平就业”章，规定劳动者就业不因民族、种族、性别、宗教信仰等不同而受歧视，并特别指出农村劳动者进城就业享有与城镇劳动者平等的劳动权利。</p><p>1. Since 1988 China has promulgated the Law of the People’s Republic of China for the Protection of Disabled Persons, Law of the People’s Republic of China for the Protection of Women’s Rights and Interests, Law of the People’s Republic of China for the Protection of Minors, Regulations Concerning the Labor Protection of Female Staff and Workers, Provisions Concerning the Prohibition of the Use of Child Labor, Regulations on the Employment of the Disabled, and other laws and administrative regulations. The Employment Promotion Law has a special chapter on equal employment, which stipulates that no employees shall be discriminated against on the grounds of ethnicity, race, gender and religion, and specially provides that rural employees work-ing in cities should enjoy the same labor rights as urban employees.</p>
《宗教事务条例》	《宗教事务条例》       【英】<h1>the Regulations on Supervising Religious Affairs</h1>译文来源     <p>Report on the Work of the Government 2011</p>定义来源     <p>2011 政府工作报告</p>例句     <p>1. 全面贯彻党的宗教工作基本方针，深入落实《宗教事务条例》，发挥宗教界人士和信教群众在促进经济发展、社会和谐中的积极作用。</p><p>1. We will comprehensively implement the Party's basic policy on religious work, thoroughly implement the Regulations on Supervising Religious Affairs, and get religious figures and believers to play an active role in promoting economic development and social harmony.</p>
《宗教院校学位授予办法（试行）》	《宗教院校学位授予办法（试行）》       【英】<h1>the Measures on the Granting of Degrees by Religious Schools (for trial implementation)</h1>译文来源     <p>Assessment Report on the Implementation of the National Human Rights Action Plan of China (2012-2015)</p>定义来源     <p>《国家人权行动计划（2012-2015年）》实施评估报告</p>例句     <p>1. 国家宗教事务局颁布了《宗教院校教师资格认定和职称评审聘任办法（试行）》《宗教院校学位授予办法（试行）》，进一步保护宗教院校教师、学生的合法权益，推进宗教院校管理规范化。</p><p>1. The State Administration for Religious Affairs promulgated the Measures for Confirming the Qualifications and Determining the Professional Titles of Teachers of Religious Schools (for trial implementation) and the Measures on the Granting of Degrees by Religious Schools (for trial implementation), so as to further protect the legitimate rights and interests of teachers and students of religious schools and regulate the schools' management.</p>
《宗教院校教师资格认定和职称评审聘任办法（试行）》	《宗教院校教师资格认定和职称评审聘任办法（试行）》       【英】<h1>the Measures for Confirming the Qualifications and Determining the Professional Titles of Teachers of Religious Schools (for trial implementation)</h1>译文来源     <p>Assessment Report on the Implementation of the National Human Rights Action Plan of China (2012-2015)</p>定义来源     <p>《国家人权行动计划（2012-2015年）》实施评估报告</p>例句     <p>1. 国家宗教事务局颁布了《宗教院校教师资格认定和职称评审聘任办法（试行）》《宗教院校学位授予办法（试行）》，进一步保护宗教院校教师、学生的合法权益，推进宗教院校管理规范化。</p><p>1. The State Administration for Religious Affairs promulgated the Measures for Confirming the Qualifications and Determining the Professional Titles of Teachers of Religious Schools (for trial implementation) and the Measures on the Granting of Degrees by Religious Schools (for trial implementation), so as to further protect the legitimate rights and interests of teachers and students of religious schools and regulate the schools' management.</p>
《审计署政府信息公开工作规定》	《审计署政府信息公开工作规定》       【英】<h1>the Rules on the Disclosure of Government Information of the National Audit Office</h1>译文来源     <p>Assessment Report on the Implementation of the National Human Rights Action Plan of China (2012-2015)</p>定义来源     <p>《国家人权行动计划（2012-2015年）》实施评估报告</p>例句     <p>1. 修改完善《审计署政府信息公开工作规定》。2015年，审计署政务微信上线运行，中国审计报数字APP、中国审计数字出版网上线。</p><p>1. The Rules on the Disclosure of Government Information of the National Audit Office has been revised and improved. In 2015, the National Audit Office launched its government affairs account on WeChat, the China Audit newspaper digital APP, and the China Audit Digital Publication Website.</p>
《对外合作开采海洋石油资源条例》	《对外合作开采海洋石油资源条例》       【英】<h1>Rules on External Cooperation for Ocean Oil Exploitation</h1>译文来源     <p>China's Energy Conditions and Policies 2012</p>定义来源     <p>中国的能源状况与政策 2012</p>例句     <p>1. 2001年，中国公布了修订后的《对外合作开采海洋石油资源条例》和《对外合作开采陆上石油资源条例》，依法保护参与合作开采的外商合法权益。</p><p>1. In 2001, China promulgated the revised Rules on External Cooperation for Ocean Oil Exploitation as well as Rules on External Cooperation for Onshore Oil Exploitation. China protects the legitimate rights and interests of foreign business people participating in collaborative oil exploitation.</p>
《对外合作开采陆上石油资源条例》	《对外合作开采陆上石油资源条例》       【英】<h1>Rules on External Cooperation for Onshore Oil Exploitation</h1>译文来源     <p>China's Energy Conditions and Policies 2012</p>定义来源     <p>中国的能源状况与政策 2012</p>例句     <p>1. 2001年，中国公布了修订后的《对外合作开采海洋石油资源条例》和《对外合作开采陆上石油资源条例》，依法保护参与合作开采的外商合法权益。</p><p>1. In 2001, China promulgated the revised Rules on External Cooperation for Ocean Oil Exploitation as well as Rules on External Cooperation for Onshore Oil Exploitation. China protects the legitimate rights and interests of foreign business people participating in collaborative oil exploitation.</p>
《工伤职工劳动能力鉴定管理办法》	《工伤职工劳动能力鉴定管理办法》       【英】<h1>the Administrative Measure for Assessing the Work Capacity of Employees Sustaining Work-Related Injuries</h1>译文来源     <p>Assessment Report on the Implementation of the National Human Rights Action Plan of China (2012-2015)</p>定义来源     <p>《国家人权行动计划（2012-2015年）》实施评估报告</p>例句     <p>1. 人力资源社会保障部发布《社会保险费申报缴纳管理规定》《工伤职工劳动能力鉴定管理办法》等规章。</p><p>1.  The Ministry of Human Resources and Social Security issued regulations including the Provisions on the Administration of Declaration and Payment of Social Insurance Premiums and the Administrative Measure for Assessing the Work Capacity of Employees Sustaining Work-Related Injuries.</p>
《工作场所职业卫生监督管理规定》	《工作场所职业卫生监督管理规定》       【英】<h1>the Provisions on the Supervision and Administration of Occupational Health at Work Sites</h1>译文来源     <p>Assessment Report on the Implementation of the National Human Rights Action Plan of China (2012-2015)</p>定义来源     <p>《国家人权行动计划（2012-2015年）》实施评估报告</p>例句     <p>1. 有关部门修改《职业病诊断与鉴定管理办法》《职业病危害因素分类目录》，制定《工作场所职业卫生监督管理规定》等5部规章、《职业健康检查管理办法》和新增职业病诊断标准，发布《石材加工工艺防尘技术规范》等70余项职业卫生技术标准。</p><p>1.  Relevant government departments revised the Administrative Measures for Diagnosis and Identification of Occupational Diseases and the Classified List of Hazardous Factors of Occupational Diseases, formulated five regulations including the Provisions on the Supervision and Administration of Occupational Health at Work Sites, the Measures for the Administration of Occupational Health Examination and criteria for diagnosing new occupational diseases. They also issued over 70 occupational health technical standards including the Technical Code for Dust Control in Stone Material Processing.</p>
《干部教育培训工作条例（试行）》	《干部教育培训工作条例（试行）》       【英】<h1>Regulations on the Work of Cadre Education and Training (Trial)</h1>译文来源     <p>China’s Human Resources 2010</p>定义来源     <p>中国的人力资源状况 2010</p>例句     <p>1. 国家把干部教育培训摆在突出位置，制定颁布了《干部教育培训工作条例（试行）》、《2006—2010年全国干部教育培训规划》和《关于2008—2012年大规模培训干部工作的实施意见》。围绕政府中心工作以及职位要求，对公务员进行初任培训、任职培训、专门业务培训和在职培训，实施对口培训计划，促进学历培训，实行挂职锻炼，有效开发公务员人力资源，促进公务员职业的发展。</p><p>1. The Chinese government has put cadre education and training in a prominent place. The state has drawn up and issued the Regulations on the Work of Cadre Education and Training (Trial), National Plan for Cadre Education and Training (2006-2010) and Opinions on the Implementation of Cadre Training Work on a Large Scale (2008-2012). With focus on the requirements of major government work and civil service posts, the government has conducted initial training, post-related training, professional training and in-service training, carried out training plans geared to the needs of the posts, promoted formal schooling training, and sent cadres to temporary posts in other places, thus effectively developing the human resources of the civil service and promoting career development for civil servants.</p>
《广州南沙新区发展规划》	《广州南沙新区发展规划》       【英】<h1>the Development Plan for the Nansha New District of Guangzhou</h1>译文来源     <p>The Practice of the “One Country, Two Systems” Policy in the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region</p>定义来源     <p>“一国两制”在香港特别行政区的实践</p>例句     <p>1. 中央政府批准设立粤港合作联席会议、泛珠三角区域合作与发展论坛。批准实施《珠江三角洲地区改革发展规划纲要（2008-2020年）》、《横琴总体发展规划》、《前海深港现代服务业合作区总体发展规划》、《广州南沙新区发展规划》，批准广东省与香港特别行政区签署《粤港合作框架协议》，明确粤港合作的重点领域，构建珠海横琴新区、深圳前海深港现代服务业合作区、广州南沙新区三大合作平台，促进粤港两地共同打造更具综合竞争力的世界级城市群和世界先进制造业、先进服务业基地。</p><p>1. The central government has endorsed the establishment of the Hong Kong-Guangdong Cooperation Joint Conference, and the Pan-Pearl River Delta Regional Cooperation and Development Forum. It approved the implementation of the Outline of the Plan for the Reform and Development of the Pearl River Delta (2008-2020), the Overall Development Plan of Hengqin, the Overall Development Plan for the Qianhai Shenzhen-Hong Kong Modern Service Industry Cooperation Zone, and the Development Plan for the Nansha New District of Guangzhou, and approved the signing by Guangdong with the HKSAR of the Framework Agreement on Hong Kong-Guangdong Cooperation, which identifies the three key areas of cooperation, namely, building the Hengqin New District of Zhuhai, the Qianhai Shenzhen-Hong Kong Modern Service Industry Cooperation Zone and the Nansha New District of Guangzhou, the central government has urged Guangdong and Hong Kong to work together to build more competitive world-class urban cluster with cutting-edge manufacturing and service industries.</p>
《应对气候变化国家方案》	《应对气候变化国家方案》       【英】<h1>the National Climate Change Program</h1>译文来源     <p>China’s Peaceful Development 2011</p>定义来源     <p>中国的和平发展 2011</p>例句     <p>1. 中国参加了１００多个政府间国际组织，签署３００多个国际公约，成为国际体系的参与者、建设者和贡献者。中国是最早制定并实施《应对气候变化国家方案》的发展中国家，也是近年节能减排力度 最大、新能源和可再生能源研发速度最快的国家之一。</p><p>1. China is a member of over 100 intergovernmental international organizations, a party to over 300 international conventions, and an active participant in building the international system. China is the first developing country to formulate and implement the National Climate Change Program. It is also one of the countries which have made the greatest efforts in energy saving and emission reduction and which have made the fastest progress in developing new and renewable energy sources in recent years.</p>
《应对气候变化国家方案》	《应对气候变化国家方案》       【英】<h1>the National Climate Change Program</h1>译文来源     <p>China’s Peaceful Development 2011</p>定义来源     <p>中国的和平发展 2011</p>例句     <p>1. 中国参加了１００多个政府间国际组织，签署３００多个国际公约，成为国际体系的参与者、建设者和贡献者。中国是最早制定并实施《应对气候变化国家方案》的发展中国家，也是近年节能减排力度 最大、新能源和可再生能源研发速度最快的国家之一。</p><p>1. China is a member of over 100 intergovernmental international organizations, a party to over 300 international conventions, and an active participant in building the international system. China is the first developing country to formulate and implement the National Climate Change Program. It is also one of the countries which have made the greatest efforts in energy saving and emission reduction and which have made the fastest progress in developing new and renewable energy sources in recent years.</p>
《廉政准则》	《廉政准则》       【英】<h1>the Code of Conduct for Building Clean and Honest Government</h1>译文来源     <p>Report on the Work of the Government 2011</p>定义来源     <p>2011 政府工作报告</p>例句     <p>1. 二是切实加强廉洁自律，认真贯彻执行《廉政准则》，落实领导干部收入、房产、投资以及配偶子女从业、移居国（境）外等情况定期报告制度，自觉接受监督。</p><p>1.  Second, we will genuinely increase incorruptibility and self-discipline; conscientiously implement the Code of Conduct for Building Clean and Honest Government; and implement the system whereby leading cadres regularly report their incomes, real estate and investments, as well as what their spouses and children do and whether they live abroad; and voluntarily accept supervision.</p>
《建筑节能条例》	《建筑节能条例》       【英】<h1>Regulations on Energy Conservation of Buildings</h1>译文来源     <p>China's Energy Conditions and Policies 2012</p>定义来源     <p>中国的能源状况与政策 2012</p>例句     <p>1. 中国高度重视并积极推进能源法律制度建设，《清洁生产促进法》、《可再生能源法》已经颁布实施，配套政策措施陆续出台；修订后的《节约能源法》已经公布；《能源法》、《循环经济法》、《石油天然气管道保护法》及《建筑节能条例》正在抓紧制订；《矿产资源法》、《煤炭法》和《电力法》正在抓紧修订。</p><p>1. China sets great store by and actively advances the construction of the energy legal system. China has enacted and put in force the Clean Production Promotion Law and Renewable Energy Law, and has issued a series of supporting policies and measures. The amended Energy Conservation Law has been promulgated. The Energy Law, Circular Economy Law, Law on the Protection of Oil and Natural Gas Pipelines and Regulations on Energy Conservation of Buildings are being formulated. The Mineral Resources Law, Coal Industry Law, and Electric Power Law are being revised.</p>
《循环经济法》	《循环经济法》       【英】<h1>the Circular Economy Law</h1>译文来源     <p>China's Energy Conditions and Policies 2012</p>定义来源     <p>中国的能源状况与政策 2012</p>例句     <p>1. 中国高度重视并积极推进能源法律制度建设，《清洁生产促进法》、《可再生能源法》已经颁布实施，配套政策措施陆续出台；修订后的《节约能源法》已经公布；《能源法》、《循环经济法》、《石油天然气管道保护法》及《建筑节能条例》正在抓紧制订；《矿产资源法》、《煤炭法》和《电力法》正在抓紧修订。</p><p>1. China sets great store by and actively advances the construction of the energy legal system. China has enacted and put in force the Clean Production Promotion Law and Renewable Energy Law, and has issued a series of supporting policies and measures. The amended Energy Conservation Law has been promulgated. The Energy Law, Circular Economy Law, Law on the Protection of Oil and Natural Gas Pipelines and Regulations on Energy Conservation of Buildings are being formulated. The Mineral Resources Law, Coal Industry Law, and Electric Power Law are being revised.</p>
《急需保护的非物质文化遗产名录》	《急需保护的非物质文化遗产名录》       【英】<h1>the List of Intangible Cultural Heritage in Need of Urgent Safeguarding</h1>译文来源     <p>Assessment Report on the Implementation of the National Human Rights Action Plan of China (2012-2015)</p>定义来源     <p>《国家人权行动计划（2012-2015年）》实施评估报告</p>例句     <p>1. 新疆维吾尔木卡姆艺术等14项和羌年等4项少数民族项目分别入选联合国教科文组织《人类非物质文化遗产代表作名录》《急需保护的非物质文化遗产名录》，在民族地区建成10个文化生态保护实验区。</p><p>1. 14 ethnic minority arts including Uygur Muqam of Xinjiang had been added to the UNESCO's Representative List of Intangible Cultural Heritage of Humanity and another 4 including Qiang New Year Festivals had been added to the List of Intangible Cultural Heritage in Need of Urgent Safeguarding. 10 experimental zones for cultural protection in ethnic minority regions have been established.</p>
《性别歧视条例》	《性别歧视条例》       【英】<h1>the Sex Discrimination Ordinance</h1>译文来源     <p>The Practice of the “One Country, Two Systems” Policy in the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region</p>定义来源     <p>“一国两制”在香港特别行政区的实践</p>例句     <p>1. 香港特别行政区还通过实施《性别歧视条例》、《种族歧视条例》、《个人资料（私隐）条例》、《独立监察警方处理投诉委员会条例》、《最低工资条例》等法例，为香港居民的权利和自由提供进一步保障。</p><p>1. The HKSAR provides further protection to residents’ rights and freedoms by enacting the Sex Discrimination Ordinance, Race Discrimination Ordinance, Personal Data (Privacy) Ordinance, Independent Police Complaints Council (IPCC) Ordinance, Minimum Wage Ordinance and other ordinances.</p>
《扶贫开发整村推进“十二五”规划》	《扶贫开发整村推进“十二五”规划》       【英】<h1>the 12th Five-year Plan for Poverty Reduction Village By Village</h1>译文来源     <p>Assessment Report on the Implementation of the National Human Rights Action Plan of China (2012-2015)</p>定义来源     <p>《国家人权行动计划（2012-2015年）》实施评估报告</p>例句     <p>1. 2012年，有关部门制定《扶贫开发整村推进“十二五”规划》。</p><p>1. In 2012, relevant government departments formulated the 12th Five-year Plan for Poverty Reduction Village By Village.</p>
《扶贫开发整村推进十二五规划》	《扶贫开发整村推进“十二五”规划》
《报刊记者站管理办法》	《报刊记者站管理办法》       【英】<h1>the Measures for the Administration of Correspondent Bureaus of Newspapers and Periodicals</h1>译文来源     <p>Assessment Report on the Implementation of the National Human Rights Action Plan of China (2012-2015)</p>定义来源     <p>《国家人权行动计划（2012-2015年）》实施评估报告</p>例句     <p>1. 国家新闻出版广电总局贯彻落实《新闻记者证管理办法》《报刊记者站管理办法》，保障新闻媒体及分支机构、新闻记者的合法采访权、舆论监督权。</p><p>1. The State Administration of Press, Publication, Radio, Film and Television has implemented the Measures for the Administration of Press Cards and the Measures for the Administration of Correspondent Bureaus of Newspapers and Periodicals, to protect the legitimate rights of news media and their branches and reporters to interview and supervise by public opinion.</p>
《指导外商投资方向规定》	《指导外商投资方向规定》       【英】<h1>the Regulations for the Guidance of Foreign Investment Orientation</h1>译文来源     <p>China's Energy Conditions and Policies 2012</p>定义来源     <p>中国的能源状况与政策 2012</p>例句     <p>1. 2002年制定了《指导外商投资方向规定》，2004年修订了《外商投资产业指导目录》和《中西部地区外商投资优势产业目录》，鼓励外商投资能源及相关的采掘、生产、供应及运输领域，鼓励投资设备制造产业，鼓励外商投资中西部地区能源产业。</p><p>1. In 2002, China formulated the Regulations for the Guidance of Foreign Investment Orientation, and revised the Catalogue of Industrial Guidance for Foreign Investment and the Catalogue of Advantageous Industries for Foreign Investment in the Central and Western Regions in 2004, in order to encourage foreign investment in the energy sector, including energy and energy-related exploitation, production, supply, transportation and energy equipment production, as well as in the energy sector of the central and western regions.</p>
《政府信息公开条例》	《政府信息公开条例》       【英】<h1>the Provisions on the Disclosure of Government Information</h1>译文来源     <p>Assessment Report on the Implementation of the National Human Rights Action Plan of China (2012-2015)</p>定义来源     <p>《国家人权行动计划（2012-2015年）》实施评估报告</p>例句     <p>1. 政府信息公开进一步推进。国务院实施《政府信息公开条例》。重点推进行政审批、财政预决算、保障性住房、食品药品安全、征地拆迁等领域的信息公开。</p><p>1. The disclosure of government information has been further promoted. The State Council implemented the Provisions on the Disclosure of Government Information. Emphasis was put on the disclosure of information relating to administrative examination and approval, financial budgets and final accounts, government-subsidized housing, food and drug safety, land requisition and resettlement as well as information in other fields.</p>
《新闻记者证管理办法》	《新闻记者证管理办法》       【英】<h1>the Measures for the Administration of Press Cards</h1>译文来源     <p>Assessment Report on the Implementation of the National Human Rights Action Plan of China (2012-2015)</p>定义来源     <p>《国家人权行动计划（2012-2015年）》实施评估报告</p>例句     <p>1. 国家新闻出版广电总局贯彻落实《新闻记者证管理办法》《报刊记者站管理办法》，保障新闻媒体及分支机构、新闻记者的合法采访权、舆论监督权。</p><p>1. The State Administration of Press, Publication, Radio, Film and Television has implemented the Measures for the Administration of Press Cards and the Measures for the Administration of Correspondent Bureaus of Newspapers and Periodicals, to protect the legitimate rights of news media and their branches and reporters to interview and supervise by public opinion.</p>
《无障碍环境建设条例》	《无障碍环境建设条例》       【英】<h1>the Regulations on the Construction of a Barrier-free Environment</h1>译文来源     <p>Assessment Report on the Implementation of the National Human Rights Action Plan of China (2012-2015)</p>定义来源     <p>《国家人权行动计划（2012-2015年）》实施评估报告</p>例句     <p>1. 2012年8月以来，国务院先后颁布《无障碍环境建设条例》《关于加快推进残疾人小康进程的意见》。</p><p>1. Since August 2012, the State Council successively formulated the Regulations on the Construction of a Barrier-free Environment and the Opinions on Accelerating the Development of a Well-off Course for People with Disabilities.</p>
《无障碍设计规范》	《无障碍设计规范》       【英】<h1>the Standards for Barrier-free Designs</h1>译文来源     <p>Assessment Report on the Implementation of the National Human Rights Action Plan of China (2012-2015)</p>定义来源     <p>《国家人权行动计划（2012-2015年）》实施评估报告</p>例句     <p>1. 有关部门修改实施《残疾人航空运输管理办法》《无障碍设计规范》，印发《关于加强村镇无障碍环境建设的指导意见》，制定实施《网站设计无障碍技术要求》。</p><p>1. Related departments revised and carried out the Management Measures for Air Transport of Persons with Disabilities and the Standards for Barrier-free Designs; published the Guiding Opinions on Strengthening the Construction of a Barrier-free Environment in Villages and Towns; and drew up and implemented the Requirements on Barrier-free Technologies for Website Design.</p>
《最低工资条例》	《最低工资条例》       【英】<h1>Minimum Wage Ordinance</h1>译文来源     <p>The Practice of the “One Country, Two Systems” Policy in the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region</p>定义来源     <p>“一国两制”在香港特别行政区的实践</p>例句     <p>1. 香港特别行政区还通过实施《性别歧视条例》、《种族歧视条例》、《个人资料（私隐）条例》、《独立监察警方处理投诉委员会条例》、《最低工资条例》等法例，为香港居民的权利和自由提供进一步保障。</p><p>1. The HKSAR provides further protection to residents’ rights and freedoms by enacting the Sex Discrimination Ordinance, Race Discrimination Ordinance, Personal Data (Privacy) Ordinance, Independent Police Complaints Council (IPCC) Ordinance, Minimum Wage Ordinance and other ordinances.</p>
《村民委员会选举规程》	《村民委员会选举规程》       【英】<h1>the Regulations and Procedures on the Election of Village Committees</h1>译文来源     <p>Assessment Report on the Implementation of the National Human Rights Action Plan of China (2012-2015)</p>定义来源     <p>《国家人权行动计划（2012-2015年）》实施评估报告</p>例句     <p>1. 基层群众自治制度更加健全。民政部制定《村民委员会选举规程》，98%以上的村委会依法实行直接选举。</p><p>1. The system of people's self-governance at grassroots level has been further improved. The Ministry of Civil Affairs has formulated the Regulations and Procedures on the Election of Village Committees, and more than 98 percent of village committees are directly elected according to law.</p>
《校车安全管理条例》	《校车安全管理条例》       【英】<h1>the Regulation on School Bus Safety Management</h1>译文来源     <p>Assessment Report on the Implementation of the National Human Rights Action Plan of China (2012-2015)</p>定义来源     <p>《国家人权行动计划（2012-2015年）》实施评估报告</p>例句     <p>1. 2012年以来，国务院制定了《校车安全管理条例》，教育部制定了《义务教育学校管理标准（试行）》等一系列规范性文件。</p><p>1. A series of normative documents, including the Regulation on School Bus Safety Management formulated by the State Council and the Standard for Compulsory Education School Management set up by the Ministry of Education, have been promulgated since 2012.</p>
《横琴总体发展规划》	《横琴总体发展规划》       【英】<h1>the Overall Development Plan of Hengqin</h1>译文来源     <p>The Practice of the “One Country, Two Systems” Policy in the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region</p>定义来源     <p>“一国两制”在香港特别行政区的实践</p>例句     <p>1. 中央政府批准设立粤港合作联席会议、泛珠三角区域合作与发展论坛。批准实施《珠江三角洲地区改革发展规划纲要（2008-2020年）》、《横琴总体发展规划》、《前海深港现代服务业合作区总体发展规划》、《广州南沙新区发展规划》，批准广东省与香港特别行政区签署《粤港合作框架协议》，明确粤港合作的重点领域，构建珠海横琴新区、深圳前海深港现代服务业合作区、广州南沙新区三大合作平台，促进粤港两地共同打造更具综合竞争力的世界级城市群和世界先进制造业、先进服务业基地。</p><p>1. The central government has endorsed the establishment of the Hong Kong-Guangdong Cooperation Joint Conference, and the Pan-Pearl River Delta Regional Cooperation and Development Forum. It approved the implementation of the Outline of the Plan for the Reform and Development of the Pearl River Delta (2008-2020), the Overall Development Plan of Hengqin, the Overall Development Plan for the Qianhai Shenzhen-Hong Kong Modern Service Industry Cooperation Zone, and the Development Plan for the Nansha New District of Guangzhou, and approved the signing by Guangdong with the HKSAR of the Framework Agreement on Hong Kong-Guangdong Cooperation, which identifies the three key areas of cooperation, namely, building the Hengqin New District of Zhuhai, the Qianhai Shenzhen-Hong Kong Modern Service Industry Cooperation Zone and the Nansha New District of Guangzhou, the central government has urged Guangdong and Hong Kong to work together to build more competitive world-class urban cluster with cutting-edge manufacturing and service industries.</p>
《残疾人参加普通高等学校招生全国统一考试管理规定（暂行）》	《残疾人参加普通高等学校招生全国统一考试管理规定（暂行）》       【英】<h1>the Administrative Provisions on Disabled Persons' Participation in the National College Entrance Examination (temporary)</h1>译文来源     <p>Assessment Report on the Implementation of the National Human Rights Action Plan of China (2012-2015)</p>定义来源     <p>《国家人权行动计划（2012-2015年）》实施评估报告</p>例句     <p>1. 有关部门于2015年印发《残疾人参加普通高等学校招生全国统一考试管理规定（暂行）》，保障残疾人的平等受教育权；积极推进《残疾人教育条例》修订工作，加强法律保障。</p><p>1. In 2015, related departments published the Administrative Provisions on Disabled Persons' Participation in the National College Entrance Examination (temporary), in an effort to guarantee disabled people's right to receive education equally, and actively enhanced the revision work on the Education Regulations for the Disabled in order to strengthen legal guarantee.</p>
《残疾人就业条例》	《残疾人就业条例》       【英】<h1>Regulations on the Employment of the Disabled</h1>译文来源     <p>China’s Human Resources 2010</p>定义来源     <p>中国的人力资源状况 2010</p>例句     <p>1. 1988年以来，颁布了《中华人民共和国残疾人保障法》、《中华人民共和国妇女权益保障法》、《中华人民共和国未成年人保护法》和《女职工劳动保护规定》、《禁止使用童工规定》、《残疾人就业条例》等法律和行政法规。《就业促进法》专门设立了“公平就业”章，规定劳动者就业不因民族、种族、性别、宗教信仰等不同而受歧视，并特别指出农村劳动者进城就业享有与城镇劳动者平等的劳动权利。</p><p>1. Since 1988 China has promulgated the Law of the People’s Republic of China for the Protection of Disabled Persons, Law of the People’s Republic of China for the Protection of Women’s Rights and Interests, Law of the People’s Republic of China for the Protection of Minors, Regulations Concerning the Labor Protection of Female Staff and Workers, Provisions Concerning the Prohibition of the Use of Child Labor, Regulations on the Employment of the Disabled, and other laws and administrative regulations. The Employment Promotion Law has a special chapter on equal employment, which stipulates that no employees shall be discriminated against on the grounds of ethnicity, race, gender and religion, and specially provides that rural employees work-ing in cities should enjoy the same labor rights as urban employees.</p>
《残疾人教育条例》	《残疾人教育条例》       【英】<h1>the Education Regulations for the Disabled</h1>译文来源     <p>Assessment Report on the Implementation of the National Human Rights Action Plan of China (2012-2015)</p>定义来源     <p>《国家人权行动计划（2012-2015年）》实施评估报告</p>例句     <p>1. 有关部门于2015年印发《残疾人参加普通高等学校招生全国统一考试管理规定（暂行）》，保障残疾人的平等受教育权；积极推进《残疾人教育条例》修订工作，加强法律保障。</p><p>1. In 2015, related departments published the Administrative Provisions on Disabled Persons' Participation in the National College Entrance Examination (temporary), in an effort to guarantee disabled people's right to receive education equally, and actively enhanced the revision work on the Education Regulations for the Disabled in order to strengthen legal guarantee.</p>
《残疾人权利公约》	《残疾人权利公约》       【英】<h1>the Convention on the Rights of Persons with Disabilities</h1>译文来源     <p>Assessment Report on the Implementation of the National Human Rights Action Plan of China (2012-2015)</p>定义来源     <p>《国家人权行动计划（2012-2015年）》实施评估报告</p>例句     <p>1. 2012－2015年，中国继续认真履行已加入的国际人权条约义务，与有关条约机构就中国执行《残疾人权利公约》《儿童权利公约》《经济、社会和文化权利国际公约》《消除对妇女一切形式歧视公约》《禁止酷刑和其他残忍、不人道或有辱人格的待遇或处罚公约》情况开展建设性对话。</p><p>1. From 2012 to 2015, China continued to earnestly fulfill its obligations under the international human rights conventions to which it is a signatory and held constructive dialogue with relevant treaty bodies on China's implementation of the Convention on the Rights of Persons with Disabilities, the Convention on the Rights of the Child, the International Covenant on Economic, Social and Cultural Rights, the Convention on the Elimination of All Forms of Discrimination against Women and the Convention against Torture and Other Cruel, Inhuman or Degrading Treatment or Punishment.</p>
《残疾人航空运输管理办法》	《残疾人航空运输管理办法》       【英】<h1>the Management Measures for Air Transport of Persons with Disabilities</h1>译文来源     <p>Assessment Report on the Implementation of the National Human Rights Action Plan of China (2012-2015)</p>定义来源     <p>《国家人权行动计划（2012-2015年）》实施评估报告</p>例句     <p>1. 有关部门修改实施《残疾人航空运输管理办法》《无障碍设计规范》，印发《关于加强村镇无障碍环境建设的指导意见》，制定实施《网站设计无障碍技术要求》。</p><p>1. Related departments revised and carried out the Management Measures for Air Transport of Persons with Disabilities and the Standards for Barrier-free Designs; published the Guiding Opinions on Strengthening the Construction of a Barrier-free Environment in Villages and Towns; and drew up and implemented the Requirements on Barrier-free Technologies for Website Design.</p>
《残障权利研究》	《残障权利研究》       【英】<h1>the Research on the Rights of the Disabled</h1>译文来源     <p>Assessment Report on the Implementation of the National Human Rights Action Plan of China (2012-2015)</p>定义来源     <p>《国家人权行动计划（2012-2015年）》实施评估报告</p>例句     <p>1. 编辑出版《中国人权在行动》《中国人权事业发展报告》等人权书籍。搭建人权学术交流平台，编辑出版《人权》《人权研究》《中国人权评论》《残障权利研究》等学术刊物。</p><p>1. They edited and published a series of books on human rights, including China's Human Rights in Action and Report on the Development of Human Rights in China. They also set up an academic exchange platform for human rights, and started to publish academic periodicals including Human Rights, Human Rights Studies, China Human Rights Review and the Research on the Rights of the Disabled.</p>
《民事诉讼法》	《民事诉讼法》       【英】<h1>the Civil Procedure Law</h1>译文来源     <p>China's Efforts and Achievements in Promoting the Rule of Law 2013</p>定义来源     <p>中国的法治建设 2013</p>例句     <p>1. 在发展社会主义民主、健全社会主义法制的基本方针指引下，现行宪法以及《刑法》、《刑事诉讼法》、《民事诉讼法》、《民法通则》、《行政诉讼法》等一批基本法律出台，中国的法治建设进入了全新发展阶段。</p><p>1. Under the guidance of the basic principle of developing socialist democracy and improving the socialist legal system, China promulgated the present Constitution and basic laws, such as the Criminal Law, Criminal Procedure Law, Civil Procedure Law, General Principles of the Civil Law and Administrative Procedure Law, ushering in a new development stage of the rule of law.</p>
《民法通则》	《民法通则》       【英】<h1>the General Principles of the Civil Law</h1>译文来源     <p>China's Efforts and Achievements in Promoting the Rule of Law 2013</p>定义来源     <p>中国的法治建设 2013</p>例句     <p>1. 在发展社会主义民主、健全社会主义法制的基本方针指引下，现行宪法以及《刑法》、《刑事诉讼法》、《民事诉讼法》、《民法通则》、《行政诉讼法》等一批基本法律出台，中国的法治建设进入了全新发展阶段。</p><p>1. Under the guidance of the basic principle of developing socialist democracy and improving the socialist legal system, China promulgated the present Constitution and basic laws, such as the Criminal Law, Criminal Procedure Law, Civil Procedure Law, General Principles of the Civil Law and Administrative Procedure Law, ushering in a new development stage of the rule of law.</p>
《气候变化初始国家信息通报》	《气候变化初始国家信息通报》       【英】<h1>the Initial National Communication on Climate Change of the People's Republic of China</h1>译文来源     <p>China's Energy Conditions and Policies 2012</p>定义来源     <p>中国的能源状况与政策 2012</p>例句     <p>1. 中国政府将保护环境作为一项基本国策，签署了《联合国气候变化框架公约》，成立了国家气候变化对策协调机构，提交了《气候变化初始国家信息通报》，建立了《清洁发展机制项目管理办法》，制订了《中国应对气候变化国家方案》，并采取了一系列与保护环境和应对气候变化相关的政策和措施。</p><p>1. The Chinese government has made environmental protection a fundamental state policy, signed the United Nations Framework Convention on Climate Change, established the National Coordination Committee for Climate Change, submitted to the UN the Initial National Communication on Climate Change of the People's Republic of China, worked out the Management Measures on the Implementation of Clean Development Mechanism Projects, formulated the National Climate Change Program, and adopted a series of proactive policies and measures regarding environmental protection and climate change.</p>
《水土保持法》	《水土保持法》       【英】<h1>the Soil Conservation Law</h1>译文来源     <p>The Grain Issue in China 1996</p>定义来源     <p>中国的粮食问题 1996</p>例句     <p>1. 多年来，中国制定和完善了《农业法》、《土地管理法》、《水土保持法》等一系列法律法规，抑制了耕地面积锐减势头，使耕地净减少面积由九十年代前的年均30多万公顷，下降到目前的不足20万公顷。</p><p>1. Over the years, certain laws and regulations have been worked out and perfected, including the Agriculture Law, Land Management Law and Water and Soil Conservation Law. The result has been an alleviation in the trend of rapid reduction of cultivated land, the net area of cultivated land reduction having dropped to less than 200,000 ha from the annual average of 300,000 ha before the 1990s.</p>
《水污染防治行动计划》	《水污染防治行动计划》       【英】<h1>"action plan for water pollution prevention and control"</h1>译文来源     <p>Assessment Report on the Implementation of the National Human Rights Action Plan of China (2012-2015)</p>定义来源     <p>《国家人权行动计划（2012-2015年）》实施评估报告</p>例句     <p>1. 2015年4月，国务院发布《水污染防治行动计划》。</p><p>1. In April 2015, the State Council announced "action plan for water pollution prevention and control".</p>
《消除对妇女一切形式歧视公约》	《消除对妇女一切形式歧视公约》       【英】<h1>the Convention on the Elimination of All Forms of Discrimination against Women</h1>译文来源     <p>Assessment Report on the Implementation of the National Human Rights Action Plan of China (2012-2015)</p>定义来源     <p>《国家人权行动计划（2012-2015年）》实施评估报告</p>例句     <p>1. 2012－2015年，中国继续认真履行已加入的国际人权条约义务，与有关条约机构就中国执行《残疾人权利公约》《儿童权利公约》《经济、社会和文化权利国际公约》《消除对妇女一切形式歧视公约》《禁止酷刑和其他残忍、不人道或有辱人格的待遇或处罚公约》情况开展建设性对话。</p><p>1. From 2012 to 2015, China continued to earnestly fulfill its obligations under the international human rights conventions to which it is a signatory and held constructive dialogue with relevant treaty bodies on China's implementation of the Convention on the Rights of Persons with Disabilities, the Convention on the Rights of the Child, the International Covenant on Economic, Social and Cultural Rights, the Convention on the Elimination of All Forms of Discrimination against Women and the Convention against Torture and Other Cruel, Inhuman or Degrading Treatment or Punishment.</p>
《消除就业和职业歧视公约》	《消除就业和职业歧视公约》       【英】<h1>Convention Concerning Discrimination in Respect of Employment and Occupation</h1>译文来源     <p>China’s Human Resources 2010</p>定义来源     <p>中国的人力资源状况 2010</p>例句     <p>1. 中国政府结合本国经济社会发展实际，先后批准了《男女同工同酬公约》、《准予就业最低年龄公约》、《消除最恶劣形式童工公约》、《消除就业和职业歧视公约》等25个国际劳工公约，并积极实施有关公约。</p><p>1. The Chinese government, in line with its own economic and social development, has ratified 25 international labor conventions, such as the Convention Concerning Equal Remuneration for Men and Women Workers for Work of Equal Value, Convention on the Minimum Age for Admission to Employment, Convention on the Elimination of the Worst Forms of Child Labor, and Convention Concerning Discrimination in Respect of Employment and Occupation, and has implemented these conventions.</p>
《消除最恶劣形式童工公约》	《消除最恶劣形式童工公约》       【英】<h1>Convention on the Elimination of the Worst Forms of Child Labor</h1>译文来源     <p>China’s Human Resources 2010</p>定义来源     <p>中国的人力资源状况 2010</p>例句     <p>1. 中国政府结合本国经济社会发展实际，先后批准了《男女同工同酬公约》、《准予就业最低年龄公约》、《消除最恶劣形式童工公约》、《消除就业和职业歧视公约》等25个国际劳工公约，并积极实施有关公约。</p><p>1. The Chinese government, in line with its own economic and social development, has ratified 25 international labor conventions, such as the Convention Concerning Equal Remuneration for Men and Women Workers for Work of Equal Value, Convention on the Minimum Age for Admission to Employment, Convention on the Elimination of the Worst Forms of Child Labor, and Convention Concerning Discrimination in Respect of Employment and Occupation, and has implemented these conventions.</p>
《深化人民监督员制度改革方案》	《深化人民监督员制度改革方案》       【英】<h1>the Plan of Reform on the Enhancement of the Mechanism of People's Supervisors</h1>译文来源     <p>Assessment Report on the Implementation of the National Human Rights Action Plan of China (2012-2015)</p>定义来源     <p>《国家人权行动计划（2012-2015年）》实施评估报告</p>例句     <p>1.最高人民检察院、司法部印发《深化人民监督员制度改革方案》。截至2015年年底，全国共有人民监督员1.5万多人，聘任特约检察员3786人。</p><p>1. The Supreme People's Procuratorate and the Ministry of Justice printed and distributed the Plan of Reform on the Enhancement of the Mechanism of People's Supervisors. By the end of 2015, more than 15,000 people's supervisors had been recruited and 3,786 special procurators had been appointed.</p>
《深化干部人事制度改革纲要》	《深化干部人事制度改革纲要》       【英】<h1>the Guideline on Deepening the Reform of the Personnel System for Cadres</h1>译文来源     <p>China’s Human Resources 2010</p>定义来源     <p>中国的人力资源状况 2010</p>例句     <p>1. 中国不断深化干部人事制度改革，先后颁布《深化干部人事制度改革纲要》和《2010—2020年深化干部人事制度改革规划纲要》，针对党政机关、事业单位和国有企业的不同特点实行分类管理，逐步形成广纳群贤、人尽其才、能上能下、公平公正、充满活力的干部人事制度。</p><p>1. China has made constant efforts to deepen the reform of the personnel system for cadres. It has successively issued the Guideline on Deepening the Reform of the Personnel System for Cadres and the Outline of the Plan on Deepening the Reform of the Personnel System for Cadres (2010-2020). It has adopted a system of classified management of cadres based on different characteristics of Party and government organs, public institutions and state-owned enterprises; and has gradually brought into being a personnel system for cadres that is fair and just, and full of vitality and under which people of ability have suitable posts, are able to display their abilities to the full, and can be promoted or demoted in their positions.</p>
《清洁发展机制项目管理办法》	《清洁发展机制项目管理办法》       【英】<h1>the Management Measures on the Implementation of Clean Development Mechanism Projects</h1>译文来源     <p>China's Energy Conditions and Policies 2012</p>定义来源     <p>中国的能源状况与政策 2012</p>例句     <p>1. 中国政府将保护环境作为一项基本国策，签署了《联合国气候变化框架公约》，成立了国家气候变化对策协调机构，提交了《气候变化初始国家信息通报》，建立了《清洁发展机制项目管理办法》，制订了《中国应对气候变化国家方案》，并采取了一系列与保护环境和应对气候变化相关的政策和措施。</p><p>1. The Chinese government has made environmental protection a fundamental state policy, signed the United Nations Framework Convention on Climate Change, established the National Coordination Committee for Climate Change, submitted to the UN the Initial National Communication on Climate Change of the People's Republic of China, worked out the Management Measures on the Implementation of Clean Development Mechanism Projects, formulated the National Climate Change Program, and adopted a series of proactive policies and measures regarding environmental protection and climate change.</p>
《清洁生产促进法》	《清洁生产促进法》       【英】<h1>the Clean Production Promotion Law</h1>译文来源     <p>China's Energy Conditions and Policies 2012</p>定义来源     <p>中国的能源状况与政策 2012</p>例句     <p>1. 中国高度重视并积极推进能源法律制度建设，《清洁生产促进法》、《可再生能源法》已经颁布实施，配套政策措施陆续出台；修订后的《节约能源法》已经公布；《能源法》、《循环经济法》、《石油天然气管道保护法》及《建筑节能条例》正在抓紧制订；《矿产资源法》、《煤炭法》和《电力法》正在抓紧修订。</p><p>1. China sets great store by and actively advances the construction of the energy legal system. China has enacted and put in force the Clean Production Promotion Law and Renewable Energy Law, and has issued a series of supporting policies and measures. The amended Energy Conservation Law has been promulgated. The Energy Law, Circular Economy Law, Law on the Protection of Oil and Natural Gas Pipelines and Regulations on Energy Conservation of Buildings are being formulated. The Mineral Resources Law, Coal Industry Law, and Electric Power Law are being revised.</p>
《煤炭法》	《煤炭法》       【英】<h1>the Coal Industry Law</h1>译文来源     <p>China's Energy Conditions and Policies 2012</p>定义来源     <p>中国的能源状况与政策 2012</p>例句     <p>1. 中国高度重视并积极推进能源法律制度建设，《清洁生产促进法》、《可再生能源法》已经颁布实施，配套政策措施陆续出台；修订后的《节约能源法》已经公布；《能源法》、《循环经济法》、《石油天然气管道保护法》及《建筑节能条例》正在抓紧制订；《矿产资源法》、《煤炭法》和《电力法》正在抓紧修订。</p><p>1. China sets great store by and actively advances the construction of the energy legal system. China has enacted and put in force the Clean Production Promotion Law and Renewable Energy Law, and has issued a series of supporting policies and measures. The amended Energy Conservation Law has been promulgated. The Energy Law, Circular Economy Law, Law on the Protection of Oil and Natural Gas Pipelines and Regulations on Energy Conservation of Buildings are being formulated. The Mineral Resources Law, Coal Industry Law, and Electric Power Law are being revised.</p>
《特殊教育提升计划（2014－2016年）》	《特殊教育提升计划（2014－2016年）》       【英】<h1>the Special Education Promotion Program (2014-2016)</h1>译文来源     <p>Assessment Report on the Implementation of the National Human Rights Action Plan of China (2012-2015)</p>定义来源     <p>《国家人权行动计划（2012-2015年）》实施评估报告</p>例句     <p>1. 实施《特殊教育提升计划（2014－2016年）》，全面提升特殊教育普及水平、保障能力和教育教学质量。</p><p>1.  The state implemented the Special Education Promotion Program (2014-2016), in an effort to fully expand the reach of special education and guarantee the ability and the quality of education and teaching.</p>
《独立监察警方处理投诉委员会条例》	《独立监察警方处理投诉委员会条例》       【英】<h1>Independent Police Complaints Council (IPCC) Ordinance</h1>译文来源     <p>The Practice of the “One Country, Two Systems” Policy in the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region</p>定义来源     <p>“一国两制”在香港特别行政区的实践</p>例句     <p>1. 香港特别行政区还通过实施《性别歧视条例》、《种族歧视条例》、《个人资料（私隐）条例》、《独立监察警方处理投诉委员会条例》、《最低工资条例》等法例，为香港居民的权利和自由提供进一步保障。</p><p>1. The HKSAR provides further protection to residents’ rights and freedoms by enacting the Sex Discrimination Ordinance, Race Discrimination Ordinance, Personal Data (Privacy) Ordinance, Independent Police Complaints Council (IPCC) Ordinance, Minimum Wage Ordinance and other ordinances.</p>
《珠江三角洲地区改革发展规划纲要（2008-2020年）》	《珠江三角洲地区改革发展规划纲要（2008-2020年）》       【英】<h1>the Outline of the Plan for the Reform and Development of the Pearl River Delta (2008-2020)</h1>译文来源     <p>The Practice of the “One Country, Two Systems” Policy in the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region</p>定义来源     <p>“一国两制”在香港特别行政区的实践</p>例句     <p>1. 中央政府批准设立粤港合作联席会议、泛珠三角区域合作与发展论坛。批准实施《珠江三角洲地区改革发展规划纲要（2008-2020年）》、《横琴总体发展规划》、《前海深港现代服务业合作区总体发展规划》、《广州南沙新区发展规划》，批准广东省与香港特别行政区签署《粤港合作框架协议》，明确粤港合作的重点领域，构建珠海横琴新区、深圳前海深港现代服务业合作区、广州南沙新区三大合作平台，促进粤港两地共同打造更具综合竞争力的世界级城市群和世界先进制造业、先进服务业基地。</p><p>1. The central government has endorsed the establishment of the Hong Kong-Guangdong Cooperation Joint Conference, and the Pan-Pearl River Delta Regional Cooperation and Development Forum. It approved the implementation of the Outline of the Plan for the Reform and Development of the Pearl River Delta (2008-2020), the Overall Development Plan of Hengqin, the Overall Development Plan for the Qianhai Shenzhen-Hong Kong Modern Service Industry Cooperation Zone, and the Development Plan for the Nansha New District of Guangzhou, and approved the signing by Guangdong with the HKSAR of the Framework Agreement on Hong Kong-Guangdong Cooperation, which identifies the three key areas of cooperation, namely, building the Hengqin New District of Zhuhai, the Qianhai Shenzhen-Hong Kong Modern Service Industry Cooperation Zone and the Nansha New District of Guangzhou, the central government has urged Guangdong and Hong Kong to work together to build more competitive world-class urban cluster with cutting-edge manufacturing and service industries.</p>
《电力法》	《电力法》       【英】<h1>the Electric Power Law</h1>译文来源     <p>China's Energy Conditions and Policies 2012</p>定义来源     <p>中国的能源状况与政策 2012</p>例句     <p>1. 中国高度重视并积极推进能源法律制度建设，《清洁生产促进法》、《可再生能源法》已经颁布实施，配套政策措施陆续出台；修订后的《节约能源法》已经公布；《能源法》、《循环经济法》、《石油天然气管道保护法》及《建筑节能条例》正在抓紧制订；《矿产资源法》、《煤炭法》和《电力法》正在抓紧修订。</p><p>1. China sets great store by and actively advances the construction of the energy legal system. China has enacted and put in force the Clean Production Promotion Law and Renewable Energy Law, and has issued a series of supporting policies and measures. The amended Energy Conservation Law has been promulgated. The Energy Law, Circular Economy Law, Law on the Protection of Oil and Natural Gas Pipelines and Regulations on Energy Conservation of Buildings are being formulated. The Mineral Resources Law, Coal Industry Law, and Electric Power Law are being revised.</p>
《男女同工同酬公约》	《男女同工同酬公约》       【英】<h1>the Convention Concerning Equal Remuneration for Men and Women Workers for Work of Equal Value</h1>译文来源     <p>China’s Human Resources 2010</p>定义来源     <p>中国的人力资源状况 2010</p>例句     <p>1. 中国政府结合本国经济社会发展实际，先后批准了《男女同工同酬公约》、《准予就业最低年龄公约》、《消除最恶劣形式童工公约》、《消除就业和职业歧视公约》等25个国际劳工公约，并积极实施有关公约。</p><p>1. The Chinese government, in line with its own economic and social development, has ratified 25 international labor conventions, such as the Convention Concerning Equal Remuneration for Men and Women Workers for Work of Equal Value, Convention on the Minimum Age for Admission to Employment, Convention on the Elimination of the Worst Forms of Child Labor, and Convention Concerning Discrimination in Respect of Employment and Occupation, and has implemented these conventions.</p>
《看守所建设标准》	《看守所建设标准》       【英】<h1>Construction Standards for Detention Houses</h1>译文来源     <p>Assessment Report on the Implementation of the National Human Rights Action Plan of China (2012-2015)</p>定义来源     <p>《国家人权行动计划（2012-2015年）》实施评估报告</p>例句     <p>1. 2013年，公安部组织修订《看守所建设标准》，新建、改建和扩建的看守所全面推行床位制。</p><p>1.  In 2013, the Ministry of Public Security organized the amending of Construction Standards for Detention Houses that call for the all-round adoption of the goal of one bed for one inmate in newly built, renovated and expanded detention houses.</p>
《石材加工工艺防尘技术规范》	《石材加工工艺防尘技术规范》       【英】<h1>the Technical Code for Dust Control in Stone Material Processing</h1>译文来源     <p>Assessment Report on the Implementation of the National Human Rights Action Plan of China (2012-2015)</p>定义来源     <p>《国家人权行动计划（2012-2015年）》实施评估报告</p>例句     <p>1. 有关部门修改《职业病诊断与鉴定管理办法》《职业病危害因素分类目录》，制定《工作场所职业卫生监督管理规定》等5部规章、《职业健康检查管理办法》和新增职业病诊断标准，发布《石材加工工艺防尘技术规范》等70余项职业卫生技术标准。</p><p>1.  Relevant government departments revised the Administrative Measures for Diagnosis and Identification of Occupational Diseases and the Classified List of Hazardous Factors of Occupational Diseases, formulated five regulations including the Provisions on the Supervision and Administration of Occupational Health at Work Sites, the Measures for the Administration of Occupational Health Examination and criteria for diagnosing new occupational diseases. They also issued over 70 occupational health technical standards including the Technical Code for Dust Control in Stone Material Processing.</p>
《石油天然气管道保护法》	《石油天然气管道保护法》       【英】<h1>the Law on the Protection of Oil and Natural Gas Pipelines</h1>译文来源     <p>China's Energy Conditions and Policies 2012</p>定义来源     <p>中国的能源状况与政策 2012</p>例句     <p>1. 中国高度重视并积极推进能源法律制度建设，《清洁生产促进法》、《可再生能源法》已经颁布实施，配套政策措施陆续出台；修订后的《节约能源法》已经公布；《能源法》、《循环经济法》、《石油天然气管道保护法》及《建筑节能条例》正在抓紧制订；《矿产资源法》、《煤炭法》和《电力法》正在抓紧修订。</p><p>1. The amended Energy Conservation Law has been promulgated. The Energy Law, Circular Economy Law, Law on the Protection of Oil and Natural Gas Pipelines and Regulations on Energy Conservation of Buildings are being formulated. The Mineral Resources Law, Coal Industry Law, and Electric Power Law are being revised.</p>
《矿产资源法》	《矿产资源法》       【英】<h1>the Mineral Resources Law</h1>译文来源     <p>China's Energy Conditions and Policies 2012</p>定义来源     <p>中国的能源状况与政策 2012</p>例句     <p>1. 中国高度重视并积极推进能源法律制度建设，《清洁生产促进法》、《可再生能源法》已经颁布实施，配套政策措施陆续出台；修订后的《节约能源法》已经公布；《能源法》、《循环经济法》、《石油天然气管道保护法》及《建筑节能条例》正在抓紧制订；《矿产资源法》、《煤炭法》和《电力法》正在抓紧修订。</p><p>1. China has enacted and put in force the Clean Production Promotion Law and Renewable Energy Law, and has issued a series of supporting policies and measures. The amended Energy Conservation Law has been promulgated. The Energy Law, Circular Economy Law, Law on the Protection of Oil and Natural Gas Pipelines and Regulations on Energy Conservation of Buildings are being formulated. The Mineral Resources Law, Coal Industry Law, and Electric Power Law are being revised.</p>
《社会保险费申报缴纳管理规定》	《社会保险费申报缴纳管理规定》       【英】<h1>the Provisions on the Administration of Declaration and Payment of Social Insurance Premiums</h1>译文来源     <p>Assessment Report on the Implementation of the National Human Rights Action Plan of China (2012-2015)</p>定义来源     <p>《国家人权行动计划（2012-2015年）》实施评估报告</p>例句     <p>1. 人力资源社会保障部发布《社会保险费申报缴纳管理规定》《工伤职工劳动能力鉴定管理办法》等规章。</p><p>1.  The Ministry of Human Resources and Social Security issued regulations including the Provisions on the Administration of Declaration and Payment of Social Insurance Premiums and the Administrative Measure for Assessing the Work Capacity of Employees Sustaining Work-Related Injuries.</p>
《社区矫正实施办法》	《社区矫正实施办法》       【英】<h1>the Implementation of Community Correction</h1>译文来源     <p>Assessment Report on the Implementation of the National Human Rights Action Plan of China (2012-2015)</p>定义来源     <p>《国家人权行动计划（2012-2015年）》实施评估报告</p>例句     <p>1. 根据刑法和刑事诉讼法的有关规定，司法部会同有关部门共同制定《社区矫正实施办法》，对社区矫正的交付、执行和法律监督等作出了全面规定。</p><p>1. According to the provisions of the Criminal Law and the Criminal Procedure Law, the Ministry of Justice worked with other related departments in jointly laying down Measures for the Implementation of Community Correction, and made comprehensive stipulations on the delivery, execution and legal supervision of community correction. Efforts were made to strengthen education and management and effectively raise the quality of community correction.</p>
《禁止使用童工规定》	《禁止使用童工规定》       【英】<h1>the Provisions on the Prohibition of Using Child Labor</h1>译文来源     <p>Assessment Report on the Implementation of the National Human Rights Action Plan of China (2012-2015)</p>定义来源     <p>《国家人权行动计划（2012-2015年）》实施评估报告</p>例句     <p>1. 最高人民法院、最高人民检察院等有关部门先后下发《关于依法惩治性侵害未成年人犯罪的意见》《关于依法处理监护人侵害未成年人权益行为若干问题的意见》，加强对儿童的司法保护。贯彻落实《禁止使用童工规定》，在劳动领域维护儿童权益工作进一步加强。</p><p>1. The Supreme People's Court, the Supreme People's Procuratorate and related departments successively promulgated the Opinions on Punishing the Crime of Sexual Assault against Minors and the Opinions on Legally Handling Several Issues on Guardians' Infringement upon the Rights and Interests of Minors, so as to beef up judicial protection on juveniles. The state implemented the Provisions on the Prohibition of Using Child Labor, and further intensified efforts to safeguard children's rights and interests in the field of labor.</p>
《禁止酷刑和其他残忍、不人道或有辱人格的待遇或处罚公约》	《禁止酷刑和其他残忍、不人道或有辱人格的待遇或处罚公约》       【英】<h1>the Convention against Torture and Other Cruel, Inhuman or Degrading Treatment or Punishment</h1>译文来源     <p>Assessment Report on the Implementation of the National Human Rights Action Plan of China (2012-2015)</p>定义来源     <p>《国家人权行动计划（2012-2015年）》实施评估报告</p>例句     <p>1. 2012－2015年，中国继续认真履行已加入的国际人权条约义务，与有关条约机构就中国执行《残疾人权利公约》《儿童权利公约》《经济、社会和文化权利国际公约》《消除对妇女一切形式歧视公约》《禁止酷刑和其他残忍、不人道或有辱人格的待遇或处罚公约》情况开展建设性对话。</p><p>1. From 2012 to 2015, China continued to earnestly fulfill its obligations under the international human rights conventions to which it is a signatory and held constructive dialogue with relevant treaty bodies on China's implementation of the Convention on the Rights of Persons with Disabilities, the Convention on the Rights of the Child, the International Covenant on Economic, Social and Cultural Rights, the Convention on the Elimination of All Forms of Discrimination against Women and the Convention against Torture and Other Cruel, Inhuman or Degrading Treatment or Punishment.</p>
《种族歧视条例》	《种族歧视条例》       【英】<h1>the Race Discrimination Ordinance</h1>译文来源     <p>The Practice of the “One Country, Two Systems” Policy in the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region</p>定义来源     <p>“一国两制”在香港特别行政区的实践</p>例句     <p>1. 香港特别行政区还通过实施《性别歧视条例》、《种族歧视条例》、《个人资料（私隐）条例》、《独立监察警方处理投诉委员会条例》、《最低工资条例》等法例，为香港居民的权利和自由提供进一步保障。</p><p>1. The HKSAR provides further protection to residents’ rights and freedoms by enacting the Sex Discrimination Ordinance, Race Discrimination Ordinance, Personal Data (Privacy) Ordinance, Independent Police Complaints Council (IPCC) Ordinance, Minimum Wage Ordinance and other ordinances.</p>
《粤港合作框架协议》	《粤港合作框架协议》       【英】<h1>the Framework Agreement on Hong Kong-Guangdong Cooperation</h1>译文来源     <p>The Practice of the “One Country, Two Systems” Policy in the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region</p>定义来源     <p>“一国两制”在香港特别行政区的实践</p>例句     <p>1. 中央政府批准设立粤港合作联席会议、泛珠三角区域合作与发展论坛。批准实施《珠江三角洲地区改革发展规划纲要（2008-2020年）》、《横琴总体发展规划》、《前海深港现代服务业合作区总体发展规划》、《广州南沙新区发展规划》，批准广东省与香港特别行政区签署《粤港合作框架协议》，明确粤港合作的重点领域，构建珠海横琴新区、深圳前海深港现代服务业合作区、广州南沙新区三大合作平台，促进粤港两地共同打造更具综合竞争力的世界级城市群和世界先进制造业、先进服务业基地。</p><p>1. The central government has endorsed the establishment of the Hong Kong-Guangdong Cooperation Joint Conference, and the Pan-Pearl River Delta Regional Cooperation and Development Forum. It approved the implementation of the Outline of the Plan for the Reform and Development of the Pearl River Delta (2008-2020), the Overall Development Plan of Hengqin, the Overall Development Plan for the Qianhai Shenzhen-Hong Kong Modern Service Industry Cooperation Zone, and the Development Plan for the Nansha New District of Guangzhou, and approved the signing by Guangdong with the HKSAR of the Framework Agreement on Hong Kong-Guangdong Cooperation, which identifies the three key areas of cooperation, namely, building the Hengqin New District of Zhuhai, the Qianhai Shenzhen-Hong Kong Modern Service Industry Cooperation Zone and the Nansha New District of Guangzhou, the central government has urged Guangdong and Hong Kong to work together to build more competitive world-class urban cluster with cutting-edge manufacturing and service industries.</p>
《经济、社会和文化权利国际公约》	《经济、社会和文化权利国际公约》       【英】<h1>the International Covenant on Economic, Social and Cultural Rights</h1>译文来源     <p>Assessment Report on the Implementation of the National Human Rights Action Plan of China (2012-2015)</p>定义来源     <p>《国家人权行动计划（2012-2015年）》实施评估报告</p>例句     <p>1. 2012－2015年，中国继续认真履行已加入的国际人权条约义务，与有关条约机构就中国执行《残疾人权利公约》《儿童权利公约》《经济、社会和文化权利国际公约》《消除对妇女一切形式歧视公约》《禁止酷刑和其他残忍、不人道或有辱人格的待遇或处罚公约》情况开展建设性对话。</p><p>1. From 2012 to 2015, China continued to earnestly fulfill its obligations under the international human rights conventions to which it is a signatory and held constructive dialogue with relevant treaty bodies on China's implementation of the Convention on the Rights of Persons with Disabilities, the Convention on the Rights of the Child, the International Covenant on Economic, Social and Cultural Rights, the Convention on the Elimination of All Forms of Discrimination against Women and the Convention against Torture and Other Cruel, Inhuman or Degrading Treatment or Punishment.</p>
《网站设计无障碍技术要求》	《网站设计无障碍技术要求》       【英】<h1>the Requirements on Barrier-free Technologies for Website Design</h1>译文来源     <p>Assessment Report on the Implementation of the National Human Rights Action Plan of China (2012-2015)</p>定义来源     <p>《国家人权行动计划（2012-2015年）》实施评估报告</p>例句     <p>1. 有关部门修改实施《残疾人航空运输管理办法》《无障碍设计规范》，印发《关于加强村镇无障碍环境建设的指导意见》，制定实施《网站设计无障碍技术要求》。</p><p>1. Related departments revised and carried out the Management Measures for Air Transport of Persons with Disabilities and the Standards for Barrier-free Designs; published the Guiding Opinions on Strengthening the Construction of a Barrier-free Environment in Villages and Towns; and drew up and implemented the Requirements on Barrier-free Technologies for Website Design.</p>
《职业健康检查管理办法》	《职业健康检查管理办法》       【英】<h1>the Measures for the Administration of Occupational Health Examination</h1>译文来源     <p>Assessment Report on the Implementation of the National Human Rights Action Plan of China (2012-2015)</p>定义来源     <p>《国家人权行动计划（2012-2015年）》实施评估报告</p>例句     <p>1. 有关部门修改《职业病诊断与鉴定管理办法》《职业病危害因素分类目录》，制定《工作场所职业卫生监督管理规定》等5部规章、《职业健康检查管理办法》和新增职业病诊断标准，发布《石材加工工艺防尘技术规范》等70余项职业卫生技术标准。</p><p>1.  Relevant government departments revised the Administrative Measures for Diagnosis and Identification of Occupational Diseases and the Classified List of Hazardous Factors of Occupational Diseases, formulated five regulations including the Provisions on the Supervision and Administration of Occupational Health at Work Sites, the Measures for the Administration of Occupational Health Examination and criteria for diagnosing new occupational diseases. They also issued over 70 occupational health technical standards including the Technical Code for Dust Control in Stone Material Processing.</p>
《职业病危害因素分类目录》	《职业病危害因素分类目录》       【英】<h1>the Classified List of Hazardous Factors of Occupational Diseases</h1>译文来源     <p>Assessment Report on the Implementation of the National Human Rights Action Plan of China (2012-2015)</p>定义来源     <p>《国家人权行动计划（2012-2015年）》实施评估报告</p>例句     <p>1. 有关部门修改《职业病诊断与鉴定管理办法》《职业病危害因素分类目录》，制定《工作场所职业卫生监督管理规定》等5部规章、《职业健康检查管理办法》和新增职业病诊断标准，发布《石材加工工艺防尘技术规范》等70余项职业卫生技术标准。</p><p>1.
