工资集体协商	工资集体协商       【英】<h1>collective wage bargaining</h1>译文来源     <p>Report on the Work of the Government 2014</p>定义来源     <p>2014 政府工作报告</p>例句     <p>1. 健全企业职工工资决定和正常增长机制，推进工资集体协商，构建和谐劳动关系。</p><p>1. We will improve the mechanism for setting and increasing salaries of enterprise employees on a regular basis, encourage collective wage bargaining and make labor relations harmonious.</p>
巨大肿瘤切除	巨大肿瘤切除       【英】<h1>removal of large tumor</h1>译文来源     <p>China-Africa Economic and Trade Cooperation 2010</p>定义来源     <p>《中国与非洲的经贸合作》2010</p>例句     <p>1. 中国医疗队不仅诊治常见病、多发病，还创造条件开展心脑血管疾病治疗、断肢再植、巨大肿瘤切除等高难度手术，挽救众多生命垂危病人，并填补了受援国多项医学空白。</p><p>1. They have not only cured common and frequent diseases but also created the conditions to perform challenging operations like treatment of cardiovascular and cerebrovascular diseases, re-attachment of severed limbs and removal of large tumors, saving the lives of many patients in danger and filling the medical gap in the aided countries.</p>
巨灾保险制度	巨灾保险制度       【英】<h1>catastrophe insurance system</h1>译文来源     <p>Report on the Work of the Government 2016</p>定义来源     <p>2016政府工作报告</p>例句     <p>1. 适时启动“深港通”。建立巨灾保险制度。规范发展互联网金融。大力发展普惠金融和绿色金融。</p><p>1. The Shenzhen-Hong Kong Stock Connect will be launched at an appropriate time. A catastrophe insurance system will be established. We will work to see that Internet finance develops in line with regulations, and we will make a major push to develop inclusive and green finance.</p>
巨灾风险分散机制	巨灾风险分散机制       【英】<h1>mechanism for diffusing the risk of huge catastrophes</h1>译文来源     <p>Report on the Work of the Government 2011</p>定义来源     <p>2011 政府工作报告</p>例句     <p>1. 加大政策性金融对“三农”的支持力度。健全政策性农业保险制度，建立农业再保险和巨灾风险分散机制。</p><p>1. We will increase policy-based financial support for agriculture, rural areas, and farmers. We will improve the policy-supported agricultural insurance system, and develop an agricultural reinsurance system and a mechanism for diffusing the risk of huge catastrophes.</p>
巩固军政军民团结	巩固军政军民团结       【英】<h1>to consolidate the solidarity between the army and the government and between the army and the people</h1>译文来源     <p>Report at 16th Party Congress</p>定义来源     <p>十六大报告</p>例句     <p>1. 拥军优属，拥政爱民，巩固军政军民团结。</p><p>1. The government and the people should support the army and give preferential treatment to the families of servicemen and martyrs, and the army should support the government and cherish the people so as to consolidate the solidarity between the army and the government and between the army and the people. 　　</p>
巩固和完善社会主义制度	巩固和完善社会主义制度       【英】<h1>to consolidate and improve the socialist system</h1>译文来源     <p>Speech by Hu Jintao to the 17th National Congress</p>定义来源     <p>十七大报告</p>例句     <p>1. 中国特色社会主义道路，就是在中国共产党领导下，立足基本国情，以经济建设为中心，坚持四项基本原则，坚持改革开放，解放和发展社会生产力，巩固和完善社会主义制度，建设社会主义市场经济、社会主义民主政治、社会主义先进文化、社会主义和谐社会，建设富强民主文明和谐的社会主义现代化国家。</p><p>1. Taking the path of socialism with Chinese characteristics means we will, under the leadership of the CPC and in light of China's basic conditions, take economic development as the central task, adhere to the Four Cardinal Principles and persevere in reform and opening up, release and develop the productive forces, consolidate and improve the socialist system, develop the socialist market economy, socialist democracy, an advanced socialist culture and a harmonious socialist society, and make China a prosperous, strong, democratic, culturally advanced and harmonious modern socialist country.</p>
差别化政策	差别化政策       【英】<h1>differential policies</h1>译文来源     <p>Report on the Work of the Government 2014</p>定义来源     <p>2014政府工作报告</p>例句     <p>1. 针对阻碍发展的结构性问题，我们注重精准发力，运用市场手段和差别化政策，在优化结构中稳增长，在创新驱动中促转型，推动提质增效升级，为长远发展铺路搭桥。</p><p>1. To address structural problems that hinder development, we strove to take well-targeted steps and used both the market and differential policies to maintain steady growth while upgrading the economic structure. And we also promoted industrial transformation in the course of carrying out innovation-driven development, thereby raising the quality and returns of development, promoting industrial upgrading and creating conditions for sustaining long-term development.</p>
差别化的区域发展政策	差别化的区域发展政策       【英】<h1>differentiated policies for promoting the development of different regions</h1>译文来源     <p>Report on the Work of the Government 2015</p>定义来源     <p>2015政府工作报告</p>例句     <p>1. 完善差别化的区域发展政策。</p><p>1. - We will improve differentiated policies for promoting the development of different regions.</p>
差别化经济政策	差别化经济政策       【英】<h1>different economic policies</h1>译文来源     <p>Report on the Work of the Government 2014</p>定义来源     <p>2014 政府工作报告</p>例句     <p>1. 实施差别化经济政策，推动产业转移，发展跨区域大交通大流通，形成新的区域经济增长极。</p><p>1. We will implement different economic policies in different regions, speed up relocation of industries, develop trans-regional transportation and goods distribution networks, and create new regional economic growth poles.</p>
差额提名	差额提名       【英】<h1>multi-candidate nomination</h1>译文来源     <p>Report to the 18th National Congress of the Communist Party of China</p>定义来源     <p>十八大报告</p>例句     <p>1. 完善党内选举制度，规范差额提名、差额选举，形成充分体现选举人意志的程序和环境。</p><p>1. We should improve the system of intra-Party election, and standards governing multi-candidate nomination and election, and create procedures and a climate that fully embody the will of voters.</p>
差额选举	差额选举       【英】<h1>multi-candidate election</h1>译文来源     <p>Speech by Hu Jintao to the 17th National Congress</p>定义来源     <p>十七大报告</p>例句     <p>1. 规范干部任用提名制度，完善体现科学发展观和正确政绩观要求的干部考核评价体系，完善公开选拔、竞争上岗、差额选举办法。</p><p>1. We will standardize the cadre nomination system, perfect the cadre assessment system in accordance with the requirements of the Scientific Outlook on Development and a correct view on evaluating cadres' performances, and improve the procedures for open selection, competition for positions and multi-candidate election.</p>
己所不欲，勿施于人	“己所不欲，勿施于人”
市场化融资	市场化融资       【英】<h1>market-based financing</h1>译文来源     <p>Report on the Work of the Government 2016</p>定义来源     <p>2016政府工作报告</p>例句     <p>1. 深化投融资体制改革，继续以市场化方式筹集专项建设基金，推动地方融资平台转型改制进行市场化融资，探索基础设施等资产证券化，扩大债券融资规模。</p><p>1. Funds for specific projects will continue to be raised through market-based mechanisms. Local financing platforms will be required to transform themselves and shift toward market-based financing, the securitization of tangible assets such as infrastructure will be explored, and debt financing will be increased.</p>
市场化选聘经营者	市场化选聘经营者       【英】<h1>competitive open selection and recruitment of executives</h1>译文来源     <p>Report on the Work of the Government 2016</p>定义来源     <p>2016政府工作报告</p>例句     <p>1.推进股权多元化改革，开展落实企业董事会职权、市场化选聘经营者、职业经理人制度、混合所有制、员工持股等试点。</p><p>1. We will carry out reforms to diversify their types of equity and introduce on a trial basis the assumption of powers and responsibilities by corporate boards of directors, competitive open selection and recruitment of executives, recruitment of professional managers, mixed ownership, and employee equity stakes.</p>
市场在资源配置中的基础性作用	市场在资源配置中的基础性作用       【英】<h1>the basic role of market forces in allocating resources</h1>译文来源     <p>Speech by Hu Jintao to the 17th National Congress</p>定义来源     <p>十七大报告</p>例句     <p>1. 要深化对社会主义市场经济规律的认识，从制度上更好发挥市场在资源配置中的基础性作用，形成有利于科学发展的宏观调控体系。</p><p>1. We need to deepen our understanding of the laws governing the socialist market economy, introduce institutions to give better play to the basic role of market forces in allocating resources, and form a system of macroeconomic regulation conducive to scientific development.</p>
市场壁垒	市场壁垒       【英】<h1>market barrier</h1>译文来源     <p>Report on the Work of the Government 2012</p>定义来源     <p>2012 政府工作报告</p>例句     <p>1. 加强和完善跨区域合作机制，消除市场壁垒，促进要素流动，引导产业有序转移，推动区域经济良性互动、协调发展。</p><p>1. We will strengthen and improve inter-regional cooperation mechanisms, remove market barriers, facilitate the flow of factors of production, guide the orderly transfer of industries, and promote mutually reinforcing and coordinated economic development among regions.</p>
市场多元化战略	市场多元化战略       【英】<h1>the strategy of diversifying markets</h1>译文来源     <p>Report on the Work of the Government 2013</p>定义来源     <p>2013 政府工作报告</p>例句     <p>1. 我们积极应对外部环境的急剧变化，及时出台稳定外需的政策措施，实施市场多元化战略，</p><p>1. We actively responded to drastic changes in the external environment, promptly introduced policies and measures to stabilize external demand, and implemented the strategy of diversifying markets.</p>
市场定价、价补分离原则	“市场定价、价补分离”原则
市场就业机制	市场就业机制       【英】<h1>the market mechanism for employment</h1>译文来源     <p>Speech by Hu Jintao to the 17th National Congress</p>定义来源     <p>十七大报告</p>例句     <p>1. 要坚持实施积极的就业政策，加强政府引导，完善市场就业机制，扩大就业规模，改善就业结构。</p><p>1. We will continue to follow a proactive employment policy, strengthen government guidance, improve the market mechanism for employment, create more jobs and improve the employment structure.</p>
市场引导培训、培训促进就业的职业教育与培训机制	“市场引导培训、培训促进就业”的职业教育与培训机制

First, we will effectively manage market liquidity and control the monetary conditions for commodity prices rising too rapidly.</p>
市场经济规律	市场经济规律       【英】<h1>the laws governing the market economy</h1>译文来源     <p>Speech by Hu Jintao to the 17th National Congress</p>定义来源     <p>十七大报告</p>例句     <p>1. 遵循市场经济规律，突破行政区划界限，形成若干带动力强、联系紧密的经济圈和经济带。</p><p>1. In compliance with the laws governing the market economy, we will work beyond administrative divisions to form a number of close-knit economic rims and belts that will provide a strong impetus to the development of other areas.</p>
市场这只“看不见的手”	市场这只“看不见的手”       【英】<h1>the invisible hand of the market</h1>译文来源     <p>Report on the Work of the Government 2014</p>定义来源     <p>2014政府工作报告</p>例句     <p>1.我们深处着力，把改革开放作为发展的根本之策，放开市场这只“看不见的手”，用好政府这只“看得见的手”，促进经济稳定增长。</p><p>1. ...took reform and opening up as the fundamental way to advance development, and gave full rein to both the invisible hand of the market and the visible hand of the government to promote steady economic growth.</p>
市场这只看不见的手	市场这只“看不见的手”
市场采购贸易	市场采购贸易       【英】<h1>market purchase trade</h1>译文来源     <p>Report on the Work of the Government 2015</p>定义来源     <p>2015政府工作报告</p>例句     <p>1.促进加工贸易转型，发展外贸综合服务平台和市场采购贸易，扩大跨境电子商务综合试点，增加服务外包示范城市数量，提高服务贸易比重。</p><p>1. We will facilitate the transformation of processing trade, develop market purchase trade and a comprehensive service platform for foreign trade, expand comprehensive trials in cross-border e-commerce, turn more cities into trendsetters in undertaking services outsourced by other countries, and increase the share of service trade in China's foreign trade.</p>
市政公用设施	市政公用设施       【英】<h1>municipal public utilities</h1>译文来源     <p>Report on the Work of the Government 2016</p>定义来源     <p>2016政府工作报告</p>例句     <p>1.更好激发非公有制经济活力。大幅放宽电力、电信、交通、石油、天然气、市政公用等领域市场准入，消除各种隐性壁垒，鼓励民营企业扩大投资、参与国有企业改革。</p><p>1. We will energize the non-public sector. We will significantly relax restrictions on entry into markets such as electricity, telecommunications, transport, petroleum, natural gas, and municipal public utilities, remove hidden barriers, and encourage private companies to increase investment in these areas and participate in SOE reform.</p>
市级统筹	市级统筹       【英】<h1>unified planning at the city level</h1>译文来源     <p>Assessment Report on the Implementation of the National Human Rights Action Plan of China (2012-2015)</p>定义来源     <p>《国家人权行动计划（2012-2015年）》实施评估报告</p>例句     <p>1. 7个省实现失业保险省级统筹，21个省和新疆生产建设兵团的全部或部分地市实现市级统筹。</p><p>1. 7 provinces realized unified planning for unemployment insurance at the provincial level while all or some of the cities in 21 provinces and the Xinjiang Production and Construction Corps achieved unified planning at the city level.</p>
布达拉宫	布达拉宫       【英】<h1>the Potala Palace</h1>译文来源     <p>Assessment Report on the Implementation of the National Human Rights Action Plan of China (2012-2015)</p>定义来源     <p>《国家人权行动计划（2012-2015年）》实施评估报告</p>例句     <p>1. 截至2015年年底，布达拉宫等9项分布在民族地区的自然、文化遗产被列入《世界文化遗产名录》。</p><p>1. By the end of 2015, 9 natural and cultural sites scattered in ethnic minority regions including the Potala Palace had been added to the World Cultural Heritage List.</p>
带薪休假	带薪休假       【英】<h1>paid vacation</h1>译文来源     <p>Report on the Work of the Government 2016</p>定义来源     <p>2016政府工作报告</p>例句     <p>1.落实带薪休假制度，加强旅游交通、景区景点、自驾车营地等设施建设，规范旅游市场秩序，迎接正在兴起的大众旅游时代。</p><p>1. We will ensure people are able to take their paid vacations, strengthen the development of tourist and transport facilities, scenic spots and tourist sites, and recreational vehicle parks, and see that the tourist market operates in line with regulations. With these efforts, we will usher in a new era of mass tourism.</p>
带薪年休假	带薪年休假       【英】<h1>annual leave with pay</h1>译文来源     <p>Assessment Report on the Implementation of the National Human Rights Action Plan of China (2012-2015)</p>定义来源     <p>《国家人权行动计划（2012-2015年）》实施评估报告</p>例句     <p>1. 2015年11月开展的部分城市（60个城市）人力资源社会保障基本情况调查显示，已有超过50%的职工当年享受了带薪年休假。</p><p>1. More than 50 percent of workers enjoyed annual leave with pay in 2015, according to a survey on human resources and social security conducted in 60 cities in November 2015.</p>
干部	干部       【英】<h1>cadre</h1>译文来源     <p>Assessment Report on the Implementation of the National Human Rights Action Plan of China (2012-2015)</p>定义来源     <p>《国家人权行动计划（2012-2015年）》实施评估报告</p>例句     <p>1. 2012年以来，国家有关部门共选派西部地区和其他民族地区2100多名干部，到中央国家机关和经济相对发达地区挂职锻炼。</p><p>1. Since 2012, relevant state organs have selected more than 2,100 cadres from Western China and other ethnic regions and dispatched them to organs of the CPC Central Committee and the state as well as to regions with a comparatively prosperous economy where they assume a temporary post for personal training and development.</p>
干部人事制度	干部人事制度       【英】<h1>the cadre and personnel system</h1>译文来源     <p>Speech by Hu Jintao to the 17th National Congress</p>定义来源     <p>十七大报告</p>例句     <p>1. 不断深化干部人事制度改革，着力造就高素质干部队伍和人才队伍。</p><p>1. Continue to deepen reform of the cadre and personnel system and focus on training high-caliber cadres and personnel.</p>
干部人事制度改革	干部人事制度改革       【英】<h1>reform of the system for the management of officials and personnel</h1>译文来源     <p>Report to the 18th National Congress of the Communist Party of China</p>定义来源     <p>十八大报告</p>例句     <p>1. 要坚持党管干部原则，坚持五湖四海、任人唯贤，坚持德才兼备、以德为先，坚持注重实绩、群众公认，深化干部人事制度改革，使各方面优秀干部充分涌现、各尽其能、才尽其用。</p><p>1. We should adhere to the principle of the Party supervising the performance of officials. We should appoint officials on their merits without regard to their origins, select officials on the basis of both their moral integrity and their professional competence with priority given to the former, and promote officials who are outstanding in performance and enjoy popular support. We should deepen reform of the system for the management of officials and personnel so that officials with outstanding performance in all fields will come to the fore in large numbers, and we should tap their potential to the full and put their talent to best use.</p>
干部任用提名制度	干部任用提名制度       【英】<h1>the cadre nomination system</h1>译文来源     <p>Speech by Hu Jintao to the 17th National Congress</p>定义来源     <p>十七大报告</p>例句     <p>1. 规范干部任用提名制度，完善体现科学发展观和正确政绩观要求的干部考核评价体系，完善公开选拔、竞争上岗、差额选举办法。</p><p>1. We will standardize the cadre nomination system, perfect the cadre assessment system in accordance with the requirements of the Scientific Outlook on Development and a correct view on evaluating cadres' performances, and improve the procedures for open selection, competition for positions and multi-candidate election.</p>
干部双重管理体制	干部双重管理体制       【英】<h1>the system of dual administration of cadres</h1>译文来源     <p>Speech by Hu Jintao to the 17th National Congress</p>定义来源     <p>十七大报告</p>例句     <p>1. 健全领导干部职务任期、回避、交流制度，完善公务员制度。健全干部双重管理体制。</p><p>1. We will improve the tenure system and the recusal system for leading cadres as well as the system for transferring them between different posts, the public servant system, and the system of dual administration of cadres.</p>
干部教育培训	干部教育培训       【英】<h1>cadre education and training</h1>译文来源     <p>China’s Human Resources 2010</p>定义来源     <p>中国的人力资源状况 2010</p>例句     <p>1. 国家把干部教育培训摆在突出位置，制定颁布了《干部教育培训工作条例（试行）》、《2006—2010年全国干部教育培训规划》和《关于2008—2012年大规模培训干部工作的实施意见》。围绕政府中心工作以及职位要求，对公务员进行初任培训、任职培训、专门业务培训和在职培训，实施对口培训计划，促进学历培训，实行挂职锻炼，有效开发公务员人力资源，促进公务员职业的发展。</p><p>1. The Chinese government has put cadre education and training in a prominent place. The state has drawn up and issued the Regulations on the Work of Cadre Education and Training (Trial), National Plan for Cadre Education and Training (2006-2010) and Opinions on the Implementation of Cadre Training Work on a Large Scale (2008-2012). With focus on the requirements of major government work and civil service posts, the government has conducted initial training, post-related training, professional training and in-service training, carried out training plans geared to the needs of the posts, promoted formal schooling training, and sent cadres to temporary posts in other places, thus effectively developing the human resources of the civil service and promoting career development for civil servants.</p>
干部教育培训工作条例（试行）	《干部教育培训工作条例（试行）》
干部管理体制	干部管理体制       【英】<h1>the system for the management of officials</h1>译文来源     <p>Report to the 18th National Congress of the Communist Party of China</p>定义来源     <p>十八大报告</p>例句     <p>1. 健全干部管理体制，从严管理监督干部，加强党政正职、关键岗位干部培养选拔，完善公务员制度。</p><p>1. We should improve the system for the management of officials, conduct strict supervision over them, strengthen training and selection of officials as heads of Party and government bodies or for other key positions, and improve the public servant system.</p>
干部考核评价体系	干部考核评价体系       【英】<h1>the cadre assessment system</h1>译文来源     <p>Speech by Hu Jintao to the 17th National Congress</p>定义来源     <p>十七大报告</p>例句     <p>1. 规范干部任用提名制度，完善体现科学发展观和正确政绩观要求的干部考核评价体系，完善公开选拔、竞争上岗、差额选举办法。</p><p>1. We will standardize the cadre nomination system, perfect the cadre assessment system in accordance with the requirements of the Scientific Outlook on Development and a correct view on evaluating cadres' performances, and improve the procedures for open selection, competition for positions and multi-candidate election.</p>
干部考核评价机制	干部考核评价机制       【英】<h1>the system for assessing the performance of officials</h1>译文来源     <p>Report to the 18th National Congress of the Communist Party of China</p>定义来源     <p>十八大报告</p>例句     <p>1. 完善干部考核评价机制，促进领导干部树立正确政绩观。</p><p>1. We should improve the system for assessing the performance of officials and require leading officials to view their performance for what it is.</p>
干部选拔任用机制	干部选拔任用机制       【英】<h1>mechanism for selecting and appointing cadres</h1>译文来源     <p>Speech by Hu Jintao to the 17th National Congress</p>定义来源     <p>十七大报告</p>例句     <p>1. 坚持党管干部原则，坚持民主、公开、竞争、择优，形成干部选拔任用科学机制。</p><p>1. Adhering to the principle that the Party is in charge of cadre management, we will establish a scientific mechanism for selecting and appointing cadres on the basis of democracy, openness, competition and merit.</p>
干部队伍结构	干部队伍结构       【英】<h1>the mix of the ranks of officials</h1>译文来源     <p>Report to the 18th National Congress of the Communist Party of China</p>定义来源     <p>十八大报告</p>例句     <p>1. 优化领导班子配备和干部队伍结构，注重从基层一线培养选拔干部，拓宽社会优秀人才进入党政干部队伍渠道。</p><p>1. We should improve the composition of leading bodies and the mix of the ranks of officials, give high priority to training and selecting officials from among those working on the frontline or in local communities, and widen the channel for outstanding individuals from society at large to become Party and government officials.</p>
平均受教育年限	平均受教育年限       【英】<h1>the average schooling</h1>译文来源     <p>China’s Human Resources 2010</p>定义来源     <p>中国的人力资源状况 2010</p>例句     <p>1. 截至2009年底，全国15岁以上人口平均受教育年限接近8.9年；主要劳动年龄人口平均受教育年限为9.5年，其中受过高等教育的比例为9.9％ ；新增劳动力平均受教育年限达到12.4年。</p><p>1. By the end of 2009, the average schooling of people above 15 years old had reached nearly 8.9 years, while that of the majority of the working population was 9.5 years, of which 9.9% had received higher education. The average education time of newly increased labor force amounted to 12.4 years.</p>
平均接种率	平均接种率       【英】<h1>the average vaccination rate</h1>译文来源     <p>Assessment Report on the Implementation of the National Human Rights Action Plan of China (2012-2015)</p>定义来源     <p>《国家人权行动计划（2012-2015年）》实施评估报告</p>例句     <p>1. 儿童免疫规划疫苗接种率达到97%以上，2014年平均接种率继续保持在99%以上。</p><p>1. Over 97 percent of children were vaccinated in the national immunization program. In 2014, the average vaccination rate exceeded 99 percent going forward.</p>
平安创建活动	平安创建活动       【英】<h1>intensive campaign to ensure public security</h1>译文来源     <p>Speech by Hu Jintao to the 17th National Congress</p>定义来源     <p>十七大报告</p>例句     <p>1. 健全社会治安防控体系，加强社会治安综合治理，深入开展平安创建活动，改善和加强城乡社区警务工作，依法防范和打击违法犯罪活动，保障人民生命财产安全。</p><p>1. We will improve the crime prevention and control system, maintain law and order through comprehensive measures, launch intensive campaigns to ensure public security, reform and step up community policing in both urban and rural areas, and prevent and crack down on crime in accordance with the law to protect people's lives and property.</p>
平板玻璃	平板玻璃       【英】<h1>plate glass</h1>译文来源     <p>Report on the Work of the Government 2016</p>定义来源     <p>2016政府工作报告</p>例句     <p>1. 近三年淘汰落后炼钢炼铁产能9000多万吨、水泥2.3亿吨、平板玻璃7600多万重量箱、电解铝100多万吨。</p><p>1. Cuts made in outdated production capacity over the past three years have included over 90 million metric tons of steel and iron, 230 million metric tons of cement, over 76 million weight cases of plate glass, and more than one million metric tons of electrolytic aluminum.</p>

平等协商	平等协商       【英】<h1>to conduct consultation on an equal footing</h1>译文来源     <p>Speech by Hu Jintao to the 17th National Congress</p>定义来源     <p>十七大报告</p>例句     <p>1. 政治上相互尊重、平等协商，共同推进国际关系民主化；经济上相互合作、优势互补，共同推动经济全球化朝着均衡、普惠、共赢方向发展；</p><p>1. Politically, all countries should respect each other and conduct consultations on an equal footing in a common endeavor to promote democracy in international relations. Economically, they should cooperate with each other, draw on each other's strengths and work together to advance economic globalization in the direction of balanced development, shared benefits and win-win progress.</p>

平等机会委员会	平等机会委员会       【英】<h1>the Equal Opportunity Commission</h1>译文来源     <p>The Practice of the “One Country, Two Systems” Policy in the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region</p>定义来源     <p>“一国两制”在香港特别行政区的实践</p>例句     <p>1. 特别行政区政府设立平等机会委员会、个人资料私隐专员公署、申诉专员公署、法律援助署、独立监察警方处理投诉委员会、法律援助服务局、妇女委员会、扶贫委员会等多个机构，协助推广、保护居民的基本权利和自由。</p><p>1. A multitude of organs, including the Equal Opportunity Commission, Office of the Privacy Commissioner for Personal Data, Office of the Ombudsman, Legal Aid Department, Independent Police Complaints Council, Legal Aid Services Council, Women’s Commission and Commission on Poverty, have been set up by the HKSAR government to help promote and protect HKSAR residents’ fundamental rights and freedoms.</p>
平等相待、讲求实效、互惠互利、共同发展的原则	平等相待、讲求实效、互惠互利、共同发展的原则       【英】<h1>the principles of equality, effectiveness, mutual benefit and reciprocity, and mutual development</h1>译文来源     <p>China-Africa Economic and Trade Cooperation 2010</p>定义来源     <p>《中国与非洲的经贸合作》2010</p>例句     <p>1. 多年来，在发展过程中，中国与非洲充分发挥双方资源条件和经济结构等方面的互补性，按照平等相待、讲求实效、互惠互利、共同发展的原则，不断加强经贸合作，努力实现互利共赢。</p><p>1. During their years of development, China and Africa give full play to the complementary advantages in each other's resources and economic structures, abiding by the principles of equality, effectiveness, mutual benefit and reciprocity, and mutual development, and keep enhancing economic and trade cooperation to achieve mutual benefit and progress.</p>
年发电量	年发电量       【英】<h1>annual power output</h1>译文来源     <p>China's Energy Conditions and Policies 2012</p>定义来源     <p>中国的能源状况与政策 2012</p>例句     <p>1. 中国拥有较为丰富的可再生能源资源。水力资源理论蕴藏量折合年发电量为6.19万亿千瓦时，经济可开发年发电量约1.76万亿千瓦时，相当于世界水力资源量的12%，列世界首位。</p><p>1. China also boasts fairly abundant renewable energy resources. In 2006, the theoretical reserves of hydropower resources were equal to 6,190 billion kwh, and the economically exploitable annual power output was 1,760 billion kwh, equivalent to 12 percent of global hydropower resources, ranking the country first in the world.</p>
年度考核	年度考核       【英】<h1>the annual performance evaluation</h1>译文来源     <p>China's Energy Conditions and Policies 2012</p>定义来源     <p>中国的能源状况与政策 2012</p>例句     <p>1. 中国正在完善国内生产总值和能源消耗指标体系，将能源消耗纳入各地经济社会发展综合评价和年度考核，实行单位国内生产总值能耗指标公报制度，实施节能目标责任制和问责制，构建节能型产业体系，促进经济发展方式的根本转变。</p><p>1. China is perfecting the index system of energy consumption per-unit GDP. It will incorporate energy consumption into the overall evaluation of economic and social development and the annual performance evaluation of regional governments. It will adopt an announcement system for this index, implement a target responsibility and accountability system for energy conservation and build an energy-conserving industrial system to effect the fundamental transformation of the country's pattern of economic development.</p>
年度财政性教育经费支出	年度财政性教育经费支出       【英】<h1>annual government expenditures on education</h1>译文来源     <p>Report on the Work of the Government 2013</p>定义来源     <p>2013 政府工作报告</p>例句     <p>1. 继续推进教育优先发展。目前我国年度财政性教育经费支出总额已经超过2万亿元，今后还要继续增加，必须把这些钱用好，让人民满意。</p><p>1. We should continue to give top priority to developing education. China's annual government expenditures on education already exceed two trillion yuan and should continue to increase. We must make good use of such funding to the satisfaction of the people.</p>
年报公示制度	年报公示制度       【英】<h1>annual reporting</h1>译文来源     <p>Report on the Work of the Government 2014</p>定义来源     <p>2014政府工作报告</p>例句     <p>1. 在全国实施工商登记制度改革，落实认缴登记制，由先证后照改为先照后证，由企业年检制度改为年报公示制度，让市场主体不断迸发新的活力。</p><p>1. We will reform the business registration system nationwide and carry out registration of subscribed capital. Issuing an operating permit before a license, which was the practice in the past, will be replaced with the practice of license first, operating permit second. Annual inspections of businesses will be replaced by annual reporting to incentivize market actors.</p>

床位制	床位制       【英】<h1>one bed for one inmate</h1>译文来源     <p>Assessment Report on the Implementation of the National Human Rights Action Plan of China (2012-2015)</p>定义来源     <p>《国家人权行动计划（2012-2015年）》实施评估报告</p>例句     <p>1. 2013年，公安部组织修订《看守所建设标准》，新建、改建和扩建的看守所全面推行床位制。</p><p>1.  In 2013, the Ministry of Public Security organized the amending of Construction Standards for Detention Houses that call for the all-round adoption of the goal of one bed for one inmate in newly built, renovated and expanded detention houses.</p>
应对全球性挑战	应对全球性挑战       【英】<h1>to meet global challenges</h1>译文来源     <p>China’s Peaceful Development 2011</p>定义来源     <p>中国的和平发展 2011</p>例句     <p>1. 为维护世界和平、应对全球性挑战发挥重要作用。中国是唯一公开承诺不首先使用核武器、不对无核武器国家和无核武器区使用或威胁使用核武器的核国家。</p><p>1. China plays an important role in safeguarding world peace and meeting global challenges. China is the only nuclear-weapon country that has publicly stated that it will not be the first to use nuclear weapons, or use or threaten to use nuclear weapons against non-nuclear-weapon states or nuclear-weapon-free zones.</p>

应急保障	应急保障       【英】<h1>emergency support</h1>译文来源     <p>China's Military Strategy 2015</p>定义来源     <p>2015 中国的军事战略</p>例句     <p>1. 武警部队按照多能一体、有效维稳的战略要求，发展执勤安保、处突维稳、反恐突击、抢险救援、应急保障、空中支援力量，完善以执勤处突和反恐维稳为主体的力量体系，提高以信息化条件下执勤处突能力为核心的完成多样化任务能力。重大安全领域力量发展。</p><p>1. In line with the strategic requirement of performing multiple functions and effectively maintaining social stability, the PAPF will continue to develop its forces for guard and security, contingency response, stability maintenance, counter-terrorism operations, emergency rescue and disaster relief, emergency support and air support, and work to improve a force structure which highlights guard duty, contingency response, counter-terrorism and stability maintenance. The PAPF will enhance its capabilities for performing diversified tasks centering on guard duty and contingency response in informationized conditions.</p>

应用研究	应用研究       【英】<h1>applied research</h1>译文来源     <p>Report on the Work of the Government 2016</p>定义来源     <p>2016政府工作报告</p>例句     <p>1. 到2020年，力争在基础研究、应用研究和战略前沿领域取得重大突破，全社会研发经费投入强度达到2.5%，科技进步对经济增长的贡献率达到60%，迈进创新型国家和人才强国行列。</p><p>1. We should strive to achieve major breakthroughs in basic research, applied research, and research in strategic and frontier fields by 2020. China's investment in research and development is expected to reach 2.5% of GDP, and the contribution of scientific and technological advances toward economic growth should come to reach 60%. Fulfilling these objectives will turn China into an innovative and talent-rich country.</p>
康复扶贫贴息贷款	康复扶贫贴息贷款       【英】<h1>rehabilitation and poverty-relief interest-deducted loans</h1>译文来源     <p>Assessment Report on the Implementation of the National Human Rights Action Plan of China (2012-2015)</p>定义来源     <p>《国家人权行动计划（2012-2015年）》实施评估报告</p>例句     <p>1. 中央安排37.4亿元康复扶贫贴息贷款，扶持74.3万贫困残疾人。国家补助完成116.4万户农村贫困残疾人危房改造。</p><p>1. The central government allocated a total of 3.74 billion yuan in rehabilitation and poverty-relief interest-deducted loans to support 743,000 impoverished disabled people. The state subsidized the renovation of dilapidated houses of 1.164 million rural households with disabled members.</p>
康复训练	康复训练       【英】<h1>rehabilitation training</h1>译文来源     <p>Assessment Report on the Implementation of the National Human Rights Action Plan of China (2012-2015)</p>定义来源     <p>《国家人权行动计划（2012-2015年）》实施评估报告</p>例句     <p>1. 2011－2015年，中央财政投入经费4.32亿元，为3.6万名贫困孤独症儿童提供康复训练补助。</p><p>1. From 2011 to 2015, the central government appropriated 432 million yuan to support rehabilitation training for 36,000 autistic children living in poverty.</p>

廉洁自律	廉洁自律       【英】<h1>incorruptibility and self-discipline</h1>译文来源     <p>Report on the Work of the Government 2011</p>定义来源     <p>2011 政府工作报告</p>例句     <p>1. 二是切实加强廉洁自律，认真贯彻执行《廉政准则》，落实领导干部收入、房产、投资以及配偶子女从业、移居国（境）外等情况定期报告制度，自觉接受监督。</p><p>1.  Second, we will genuinely increase incorruptibility and self-discipline; conscientiously implement the Code of Conduct for Building Clean and Honest Government; and implement the system whereby leading cadres regularly report their incomes, real estate and investments, as well as what their spouses and children do and whether they live abroad; and voluntarily accept supervision.</p>
廉租住房	廉租住房       【英】<h1>the low-cost rental housing system</h1>译文来源     <p>Assessment Report on the Implementation of the National Human Rights Action Plan of China (2012-2015)</p>定义来源     <p>《国家人权行动计划（2012-2015年）》实施评估报告</p>例句     <p>1. 2014年，公共租赁住房和廉租住房并轨运行。</p><p>1.  In 2014, the public rental housing system and the low-cost rental housing system merged into one.</p>
廉租住房制度	廉租住房制度       【英】<h1>the low-rent housing system</h1>译文来源     <p>Speech by Hu Jintao to the 17th National Congress</p>定义来源     <p>十七大报告</p>例句     <p>1. 做好优抚安置工作。发扬人道主义精神，发展残疾人事业。加强老龄工作。强化防灾减灾工作。健全廉租住房制度，加快解决城市低收入家庭住房困难。</p><p>1. We will do a good job providing special assistance to families of martyrs and servicemen and helping demobilized military personnel return to civilian life. We will promote programs for the disabled in a humanitarian spirit. We will develop more programs for the elderly. We will intensify our efforts in disaster prevention and reduction. We will improve the low-rent housing system and speed up resolution of the housing difficulties of low-income families in urban areas.</p>
建成小康社会	建成小康社会       【英】<h1>to build a moderately prosperous society</h1>译文来源     <p>Assessment Report on the Implementation of the National Human<br/> Rights Action Plan of China (2012-2015)</p>定义来源     <p>《国家人权行动计划（2012-2015年）》实施评估报告</p>例句     <p>1. 在努力实现中华民族伟大复兴中国梦的征程中，中国政府围绕全面建成小康社会、全面深化改革、全面依法治国、全面从严治党的战略布局，将人权事业的发展与经济建设、政治建设、文化建设、社会建设和生态文明建设相结合，不断加大各项人权保障力度，努力完成《国家人权行动计划（2012－2015年）》规定的主要目标和任务，中国人权事业又上了一个新台阶。</p><p>1. While striving to realize the Chinese Dream of the great rejuvenation of the Chinese nation, the Chinese government combined its human rights endeavors with economic, political, cultural, social and ecological construction in accordance with its strategic blueprint to build a moderately prosperous society in all respects, comprehensively deepen reform, advance the law-based governance and strengthen Party self-discipline. It has taken various steps to strengthen the protection of human rights and worked strenuously to achieve the main targets and tasks set by the National Human Rights Action Plan (2012-2015), advancing the cause of human rights in China to a new stage.</p>
建机制	建机制       【英】<h1>to make relevant institutional arrangements</h1>译文来源     <p>Report on the Work of the Government 2015</p>定义来源     <p>2015政府工作报告</p>例句     <p>1. 我们坚持以人为本，持续增加民生投入，保基本、兜底线、建机制，尽管财政收入增速放缓、支出压力加大，但财政用于民生的比例达到70%以上。</p><p>1. We continued to put people first, sustaining increases to spending in areas that are important to improving standards of living. We have been working to build up a basic safety net, ensure there is a cushion in place for those most in need, and make relevant institutional arrangements. Despite a slowdown in the growth of government revenue and increased pressure on expenditures, more than 70% of last year's government budget was spent on ensuring standards of living.</p>
建筑节能条例	《建筑节能条例》
开发与节约并举，把节约放在首位	“开发与节约并举，把节约放在首位”
开发利用国内国际人才资源	开发利用国内国际人才资源       【英】<h1>to develop and utilize human resources both at home and abroad</h1>译文来源     <p>Report to the 18th National Congress of the Communist Party of China</p>定义来源     <p>十八大报告</p>例句     <p>1. 充分开发利用国内国际人才资源，积极引进和用好海外人才。</p><p>1. We should fully develop and utilize human resources both at home and abroad, and actively attract high-caliber personnel from overseas and turn them to good use.</p>
开发性金融机构	开发性金融机构       【英】<h1>development-oriented financial institution</h1>译文来源     <p>Decision of the CCCPC on Some Major Issues Concerning Comprehensively Deepening the Reform 2013</p>定义来源     <p>中共中央关于全面深化改革若干重大问题的决定 2013</p>例句     <p>1. 加快沿边开放步伐，允许沿边重点口岸、边境城市、经济合作区在人员往来、加工物流、旅游等方面实行特殊方式和政策。建立开发性金融机构，加快同周边国家和区域基础设施互联互通建设，推进丝绸之路经济带、海上丝绸之路建设，形成全方位开放新格局。</p><p>1. We will quicken the pace of opening up in border areas, and allow key ports, border cities and economic cooperation zones in the border areas to have special methods and policies with regard to personnel exchange, processing and logistics, tourism and some other areas. We will set up development-oriented financial institutions, accelerate the construction of infrastructure connecting China with neighboring countries and regions, and work hard to build a Silk Road Economic Belt and a Maritime Silk Road, so as to form a new pattern of all-round opening.</p>
开展建设性对话	开展建设性对话       【英】<h1>to hold constructive dialogue</h1>译文来源     <p>Assessment Report on the Implementation of the National Human Rights Action Plan of China (2012-2015)</p>定义来源     <p>《国家人权行动计划（2012-2015年）》实施评估报告</p>例句     <p>1. 2012－2015年，中国继续认真履行已加入的国际人权条约义务，与有关条约机构就中国执行《残疾人权利公约》《儿童权利公约》《经济、社会和文化权利国际公约》《消除对妇女一切形式歧视公约》《禁止酷刑和其他残忍、不人道或有辱人格的待遇或处罚公约》情况开展建设性对话。</p><p>1. From 2012 to 2015, China continued to earnestly fulfill its obligations under the international human rights conventions to which it is a signatory and held constructive dialogue with relevant treaty bodies on China's implementation of the Convention on the Rights of Persons with Disabilities, the Convention on the Rights of the Child, the International Covenant on Economic, Social and Cultural Rights, the Convention on the Elimination of All Forms of Discrimination against Women and the Convention against Torture and Other Cruel, Inhuman or Degrading Treatment or Punishment.</p>
开放发展	开放发展       【英】<h1>open development</h1>译文来源     <p>China’s Peaceful Development 2011</p>定义来源     <p>中国的和平发展 2011</p>例句     <p>1. 开放发展。中国从自身发展经验中深刻认识到，不能关起门来搞建设。</p><p>1. ― Open development. China has learned from its development course that it cannot develop itself with its door closed.</p>
开放型经济	开放型经济       【英】<h1>the open economy</h1>译文来源     <p>Report on the Work of the Government 2013</p>定义来源     <p>2013 政府工作报告</p>例句     <p>1. 重要领域改革取得新进展，开放型经济达到新水平；</p><p>1. Progress was made in key areas of reform; and the open economy reached a new stage of development.</p>
开放型经济体系	开放型经济体系       【英】<h1>open economic system</h1>译文来源     <p>Decision of the CCCPC on Some Major Issues Concerning Comprehensively Deepening the Reform 2013</p>定义来源     <p>中共中央关于全面深化改革若干重大问题的决定 2013</p>例句     <p>1. 紧紧围绕使市场在资源配置中起决定性作用深化经济体制改革，坚持和完善基本经济制度，加快完善现代市场体系、宏观调控体系、开放型经济体系，加快转变经济发展方式，加快建设创新型国家，推动经济更有效率、更加公平、更可持续发展。</p><p>1. We must deepen economic system reform by centering on the decisive role of the market in allocating resources, adhere to and improve the basic economic system, accelerate the improvement of the modern market system, macro-control system and open economic system. We must accelerate the transformation of the growth model, and make China an innovative country. We must promote more efficient, equal and sustainable economic development.</p>
开放型经济新体制	开放型经济新体制       【英】<h1>open economy based on new systems</h1>译文来源     <p>Report on the Work of the Government 2016</p>定义来源     <p>2016政府工作报告</p>例句     <p>1. 全面实行准入前国民待遇加负面清单管理制度，逐步构建高标准自由贸易区网络，基本形成开放型经济新体制新格局。</p><p>1. We should put into force across the board the management system for pre-establishment national treatment plus a negative list, and progressively build a network of high-standard free trade areas. With these efforts, we should be able to usher in a new phase in building an open economy based on new systems.</p>
开放战略	开放战略       【英】<h1>opening up strategy</h1>译文来源     <p>Report on the Work of the Government 2013</p>定义来源     <p>2013 政府工作报告</p>例句     <p>1. 要坚持对外开放的基本国策，实行更加积极主动的开放战略。</p><p>1. We should adhere to the basic state policy of opening up and implement a more proactive opening up strategy.</p>
开罗国际会议中心	开罗国际会议中心       【英】<h1>the Cairo International Conference Center</h1>译文来源     <p>China-Africa Economic and Trade Cooperation 2010</p>定义来源     <p>《中国与非洲的经贸合作》2010</p>例句     <p>1. 中国援建的埃及开罗国际会议中心，总建筑面积５.８万平方米，每年举行上百个国际会议及展览，推动了当地商贸及旅游业发展。</p><p>1. The Cairo International Conference Center, aided by China, covers a floor space of 58,000 sq m and hosts more than a hundred international meetings and exhibitions each year, promoting the development of local business and tourism.</p>
异地高考	异地高考       【英】<h1>students taking national college entrance exams in places where their parents work and live</h1>译文来源     <p>Assessment Report on the Implementation of the National Human Rights Action Plan of China (2012-2015)</p>定义来源     <p>《国家人权行动计划（2012-2015年）》实施评估报告</p>例句     <p>1. 自2012年起，异地高考逐步开放，受教育权得到更加充分的落实；2013年12月，劳动教养制度被废止；2015年8月，对四类服刑罪犯予以特赦；</p><p>1. Starting in 2012, restrictions on students taking national college entrance exams in places where their parents work and live were gradually lifted and their rights to education were further enhanced. In December 2013, the reeducation through labor system was abolished. In August 2015, four categories of criminals serving their prison terms were pardoned under an amnesty and Amendment IX to the Criminal Law was deliberated and passed.</p>
异常波动	异常波动       【英】<h1>unusual fluctuations</h1>译文来源     <p>Report on the Work of the Government 2016</p>定义来源     <p>2016政府工作报告</p>例句     <p>1. 去年还积极应对股市、汇市异常波动等金融领域的多种风险挑战，守住了不发生系统性区域性风险的底线，维护了国家经济金融安全。</p><p>1. In 2015, we also responded proactively to a variety of risks and challenges in the financial sector, such as unusual fluctuations in the stock market and the foreign exchange market, ensuring that no systemic or regional threats arose, thus safeguarding China's economic and financial security.</p>
引咎辞职制度	引咎辞职制度       【英】<h1>the system of resignation</h1>译文来源     <p>Speech by Hu Jintao to the 17th National Congress</p>定义来源     <p>十七大报告</p>例句     <p>1. 重点加强对领导干部特别是主要领导干部、人财物管理使用、关键岗位的监督，健全质询、问责、经济责任审计、引咎辞职、罢免等制度。</p><p>1. We will focus on tightening oversight over leading cadres and especially principal ones, over the management and use of human, financial and material resources, and over key positions.  We will improve the systems of inquiries, accountability, economic responsibility auditing, resignation and recall.</p>
引导基金	引导基金       【英】<h1>seed funds</h1>译文来源     <p>Report on the Work of the Government 2016</p>定义来源     <p>2016政府工作报告</p>例句     <p>1. 完善政府和社会资本合作模式，用好1800亿元引导基金，依法严格履行合同，充分激发社会资本参与热情。</p><p>1. We will improve the public-private partnership model, make good use of the 180 billion yuan in seed funds, and strictly honor contracts in accordance with the law, so as to bring the enthusiasm of private investors to the table.</p>
引水调水	引水调水       【英】<h1>to divert water</h1>译文来源     <p>Report on the Work of the Government 2014</p>定义来源     <p>2014 政府工作报告</p>例句     <p>1. 今年拟安排中央预算内水利投资7OO多亿元，支持引水调水、骨干水源、江河湖泊治理、高效节水灌溉等重点项目。</p><p>1. Over 70 billion yuan will be allocated from the central government budget this year to fund major projects to divert water, protect key water sources, harness rivers and lakes, and develop efficient water-saving irrigation.</p>

We should step up efforts to attract investment, technology and high-caliber professionals from overseas. Chinese companies should expand overseas presence at a faster pace, enhance their operation in an international environment, and develop a number of world-class multinational corporations.</p>

引进消化吸收再创新	引进消化吸收再创新       【英】<h1>to make further innovation on the basis of absorbing advances in overseas science and technology</h1>译文来源     <p>Report to the 18th National Congress of the Communist Party of China</p>定义来源     <p>十八大报告</p>例句     <p>1. 要坚持走中国特色自主创新道路，以全球视野谋划和推动创新，提高原始创新、集成创新和引进消化吸收再创新能力，更加注重协同创新。</p><p>1. We should follow a path of making innovation with Chinese features and take steps to promote innovation to catch up with global advances. We should increase our capacity for making original innovation and integrated innovation and for making further innovation on the basis of absorbing advances in overseas science and technology, and place greater emphasis on making innovation through collaboration.</p>

弘扬新风正气	弘扬新风正气       【英】<h1>to promote new healthy trends</h1>译文来源     <p>Speech by Hu Jintao to the 17th National Congress</p>定义来源     <p>十七大报告</p>例句     <p>1. 全党同志特别是领导干部都要讲党性、重品行、作表率。深入开展党风党纪教育，积极进行批评和自我批评，使领导干部自觉遵守党纪国法，继承优良传统，弘扬新风正气，以优良的党风促政风带民风。</p><p>1. All Party members, especially leading cadres, must uphold the Party spirit, be impeccable in moral standards and play an exemplary role in society. We need to strengthen education in the Party's style of work and Party discipline and vigorously practice criticism and self-criticism so that leading cadres will conscientiously observe Party discipline and state laws, carry forward the Party's fine traditions and promote new healthy trends. With the Party's fine style of work, we will be able to improve the work style of the government and the conduct of the general public.</p>
弘扬时代新风	弘扬时代新风       【英】<h1>to advocate new trends of the times</h1>译文来源     <p>Report to the 18th National Congress of the Communist Party of China</p>定义来源     <p>十八大报告</p>例句     <p>1. 要坚持依法治国和以德治国相结合，加强社会公德、职业道德、家庭美德、个人品德教育，弘扬中华传统美德，弘扬时代新风。</p><p>1. 弘扬真善美、贬斥假恶丑	弘扬真善美、贬斥假恶丑       【英】<h1>to exalt the true, the good, and the beautiful and reject the false, the evil, and the ugly</h1>译文来源     <p>Report to the 18th National Congress of the Communist Party of China</p>定义来源     <p>十八大报告</p>例句     <p>1. 推进公民道德建设工程，弘扬真善美、贬斥假恶丑，引导人们自觉履行法定义务、社会责任、家庭责任，营造劳动光荣、创造伟大的社会氛围，培育知荣辱、讲正气、作奉献、促和谐的良好风尚。</p><p>1. We should press ahead with the program for improving civic morality, exalt the true, the good, and the beautiful and reject the false, the evil, and the ugly. We should encourage people to willingly meet their statutory duties and obligations to society and family. We should create a social atmosphere in which work is honored and creation is lauded, and cultivate social trends of recognizing honor and disgrace, practicing integrity, encouraging dedication, and promoting harmony.</p>

强农惠农富农政策	强农惠农富农政策       【英】<h1>policy support to strengthen agriculture, benefit farmers, and raise rural living standards</h1>译文来源     <p>Report on the Work of the Government 2015</p>定义来源     <p>2015政府工作报告</p>例句     <p>1. 加大强农惠农富农政策力度，实现粮食产量“十一连增”、农民收入“五连快”。</p><p>1. 强制报告	强制报告       【英】<h1>mandatory reporting</h1>译文来源     <p>Assessment Report on the Implementation of the National Human Rights Action Plan of China (2012-2015)</p>定义来源     <p>《国家人权行动计划（2012-2015年）》实施评估报告</p>例句     <p>1. 2015年12月27日，全国人大常委会通过的反家庭暴力法，专门设立了公安告诫、人身安全保护令和强制报告等制度。</p><p>1. On December 27, 2015, the NPC Standing Committee approved the Anti-domestic Violence Law, in which systems, such as police cautions, writ of habeas corpus and mandatory reporting, were specially set up.</p>
强制措施	强制措施       【英】<h1>compulsory measures</h1>译文来源     <p>Assessment Report on the Implementation of the National Human Rights Action Plan of China (2012-2015)</p>定义来源     <p>《国家人权行动计划（2012-2015年）》实施评估报告</p>例句     <p>1. 2012年3月修改后的刑事诉讼法明确规定“尊重和保障人权”，完善了证据制度、强制措施、辩护制度、侦查措施、审判程序、执行程序等。</p><p>1.  The amended Criminal Procedure Law adopted in March 2012 clearly stipulated the respect and protection of human rights, and improved the evidence collecting system, compulsory measures, defense system, criminal investigation, trial procedures and enforcement procedures.</p>
强化政策支持	强化政策支持       【英】<h1>to increase policy support</h1>译文来源     <p>Report on the Work of the Government 2012</p>定义来源     <p>2012 政府工作报告</p>例句     <p>1. 我国正处于对外投资加快发展的重要阶段，要加强宏观指导，强化政策支持，简化审批手续，健全服务保障。</p><p>1.  With China's outward investment in an important stage of accelerated development, we will enhance macro-guidance, increase policy support, streamline approval procedures, and improve services for Chinese investors.</p>
强实体	强实体       【英】<h1>to boost the real economy</h1>译文来源     <p>Report on the Work of the Government 2015</p>定义来源     <p>2015政府工作报告</p>例句     <p>1.面对经济下行压力加大态势，我们保持战略定力，稳定宏观经济政策，没有采取短期强刺激措施，而是继续创新宏观调控思路和方式，实行定向调控，激活力、补短板、强实体。</p><p>1. In the face of mounting downward economic pressure, we maintained strategic focus and kept our macroeconomic policy unchanged. Instead of using short-term stimulus measures, we continued to develop new ideas and methods for macro regulation. We exercised targeted regulation, stimulated market activity, shored up our weak spots, and boosted the real economy.</p>
强权政治	强权政治       【英】<h1>power politics</h1>译文来源     <p>Speech by Hu Jintao to the 17th National Congress</p>定义来源     <p>十七大报告</p>例句     <p>1. 霸权主义和强权政治依然存在，局部冲突和热点问题此起彼伏，全球经济失衡加剧，南北差距拉大，传统安全威胁和非传统安全威胁相互交织，世界和平与发展面临诸多难题和挑战。</p><p>1. Hegemonism and power politics still exist, local conflicts and hotspot issues keep emerging, imbalances in the world economy are worsening, the North-South gap is widening, and traditional and nontraditional threats to security are intertwined. All this poses difficulties and challenges to world peace and development.</p>
归侨	归侨       【英】<h1>overseas Chinese nationals who have returned to China</h1>译文来源     <p>Report on the Work of the Government 2015</p>定义来源     <p>2015政府工作报告</p>例句     <p>1. 我们要更好发挥海外侨胞和归侨侨眷参与祖国现代化建设、促进祖国和平统一、推进中外交流合作的独特作用，使海内外中华儿女的向心力不断增强。</p><p>1. We need to ensure that overseas Chinese nationals, overseas Chinese nationals who have returned to China, and the relatives of overseas Chinese nationals who themselves live in China can all perform better the unique role they have to play in modernizing China, advancing its peaceful reunification, and promoting exchange and cooperation between China and other countries. We need to strengthen the bonds of attachment and affection of all Chinese, whether at home or overseas, to our motherland.</p>

We must persist in overall consideration. We need to correctly understand and handle the major relationships in the cause of socialism with Chinese characteristics and balance urban and rural development, development among regions, economic and social development, relations between man and nature, and domestic development and opening to the outside world. We must take into overall consideration the relationships between the central and local authorities, between personal and collective interests, between interests of the part and those of the whole, and between immediate and long-term interests, so as to fully arouse the initiative of all sides.</p>

形成	形成       【英】<h1>to formulate</h1>译文来源     <p>Assessment Report on the Implementation of the National Human<br/> Rights Action Plan of China (2012-2015)</p>定义来源     <p>《国家人权行动计划（2012-2015年）》实施评估报告</p>例句     <p>1. 在此基础上，联席会议机制组织中央和国家机关有关部门和单位、人民团体、社会组织以及中央党校、南开大学、山东大学、西南政法大学、上海社会科学院等高校和科研机构人权专家，对照《行动计划》中各项指标，对各部门、各单位的自我评估情况进行逐条核实和分析，并广泛征求联席会议机制成员单位和社会各界的意见和建议，最后形成了《〈国家人权行动计划（2012－2015年）〉实施评估报告》，现予以公布。</p><p>1. On this basis, the joint meeting mechanism organized a team of human rights experts from relevant departments and institutions of the central government, mass organizations and social groups as well as the Party School of the CPC Central Committee, Nankai University, Shandong University, Southwest University of Political Science and Law, Shanghai Academy of Social Sciences, and other universities and research institutions. The team examined and analyzed the self-appraisals of each department and institution in accordance with the targets set by the Action Plan, solicited opinions and suggestions from member organizations of the joint meeting mechanism and all social sectors and finally formulated the Assessment Report on the Implementation of the National Human Rights Action Plan of China (2012-2015). It is hereby promulgated as follows.</p>

It established the basic line for the primary stage of socialism, sounded the clarion call of the times for taking our own road and building socialism with Chinese characteristics, founded Deng Xiaoping Theory, and led the whole Parry and the people of all ethnic groups in striding forward on the great journey of reform and opening up.</p>

徇私枉法	徇私枉法       【英】<h1>to abuse the law</h1>译文来源     <p>Report to the 18th National Congress of the Communist Party of China</p>定义来源     <p>十八大报告</p>例句     <p>1.党领导人民制定宪法和法律，党必须在宪法和法律范围内活动。任何组织或者个人都不得有超越宪法和法律的特权，绝不允许以言代法、以权压法、徇私枉法。</p><p>1. As the Constitution and laws are adopted by the Party and the people under its leadership, the Party must act within the scope prescribed by the Constitution and laws. No organization or individual has the privilege of overstepping the Constitution and laws, and no one in a position of power is allowed in any way to take one's own words as the law, place one's own authority above the law or abuse the law.</p>

We should preserve our geographical space and improve our industrial structure, way of production and way of life in the interest of conserving resources and protecting the environment. We should address the root cause of deterioration of the ecological environment so as to reverse this trend, create a sound working and living environment for the people, and contribute our share to global ecological security.</p>

思想道德风尚	思想道德风尚       【英】<h1>ideological and ethical trends</h1>译文来源     <p>Speech by Hu Jintao to the 17th National Congress</p>定义来源     <p>十七大报告</p>例句     <p>1. 加强文化建设，明显提高全民族文明素质。社会主义核心价值体系深入人心，良好思想道德风尚进一步弘扬。</p><p>1. Promote cultural development and notably enhance the cultural and ethical quality of the whole nation. Socialist core values will prevail among the people, and fine ideological and ethical trends will be encouraged.</p>
急需专业技术人才	急需专业技术人才       【英】<h1>much-needed professionals of ethnic-minority groups</h1>译文来源     <p>China’s Human Resources 2010</p>定义来源     <p>中国的人力资源状况 2010</p>例句     <p>1. 为加强西部地区人才开发，中国政府制定《关于进一步加强西部地区人才队伍建设的意见》，实施新疆、西藏少数民族科技骨干和青海三江源地区专业技术人才培养计划。2009年共培养2888名少数民族科技骨干人才和急需专业技术人才。</p><p>1. To promote human resources development in Western China, the Chinese government issued the Opinions on Strengthening Human Resources Development in Western China and carried out a training plan for the backbone personnel in the scientific and techno-logical field in the Xinjiang Uygur and Tibet autonomous regions, and for professionals in the Sanjiangyuan area of Qinghai Province. In 2009 China trained 2,888 backbone scientific and technical personnel and much-needed professionals of ethnic-minority groups.</p>

Third, it ratifies the establishment of consulates and other governmental or quasi-governmental organizations of foreign countries in the HKSAR. Currently, there are 66 consulates-general set up by foreign countries under related agreements in the HKSAR, with 73 honorary consuls.</p>
恐怖主义	恐怖主义       【英】<h1>terrorism</h1>译文来源     <p>China’s Peaceful Development 2011</p>定义来源     <p>中国的和平发展 2011</p>例句     <p>1. 中国有广阔的领土和辽阔的海洋，陆地边界２．２万多公里，大陆海岸线１．８万多公里。中国面临复杂多样的传统和 非传统安全挑战，受到分裂势力和恐怖主义等威胁。</p><p>1.  China has a vast land territory and sea area, with a borderline of over 22,000 kilometers and a coastline of over 18,000 kilometers. China faces multiple traditional and non-traditional security challenges and the threat of separatists and terrorism. It is therefore necessary and justified to modernize China’s defense capabilities in order to uphold China’s security and protect its peaceful development.</p>
恶意炒作	恶意炒作       【英】<h1>speculation</h1>译文来源     <p>Report on the Work of the Government 2012</p>定义来源     <p>2012 政府工作报告</p>例句     <p>1. 坚决治理交通运输领域乱收费乱罚款，纠正大型零售商业企业违规收费行为，严厉查处发布虚假信息、囤积居奇、操纵价格、恶意炒作等违法行为。把握好舆论导向，正确引导社会预期。</p><p>1. We will put an end to unauthorized collection of charges and fines in the transportation sector; stop large commercial retailers from illegally collecting fees; and crack down on illegal practices such as releasing false information, hoarding and profiteering, manipulating prices, and speculation. We will lead public opinion and correctly guide public expectations of price movements.</p>
惠民生	惠民生       【英】<h1>to improve people's lives</h1>译文来源     <p>Assessment Report on the Implementation of the National Human<br/> Rights Action Plan of China (2012-2015)</p>定义来源     <p>《国家人权行动计划（2012-2015年）》实施评估报告</p>例句     <p>1. 2012－2015年，面对错综复杂的国际形势和艰巨繁重的国内改革发展稳定任务，中国政府坚持创新、协调、绿色、开放、共享的新发展理念，主动适应和引领经济发展新常态，不断深化改革，扩大开放，坚持稳增长、促改革、调结构、惠民生、防风险，推动经济更有效率、更加公平、更可持续发展，改革发展红利惠及全体人民，使全体人民在共建共享中有更多获得感。</p><p>1. From 2012 to 2015, faced with a complex international situation and the challenging tasks of promoting reform and development while maintaining stability at home, the Chinese government stuck to the new vision of innovative, coordinated, green, open and shared development, actively adapted to and promoted the 'new normal' in economic development, and made unceasing efforts to deepen reform and opening-up. It stuck to the policy of maintaining stable growth, promoting reform, making structural adjustments, improving people's lives and guarding against risks to push for more efficient, fairer and more sustainable growth. It also worked to ensure that all people can enjoy the dividend of reform and development and that they gain an increasingly greater sense of benefit.</p>
惩治和预防腐败体系	惩治和预防腐败体系       【英】<h1>the institution for punishing and preventing corruption</h1>译文来源     <p>Speech by Hu Jintao to the 17th National Congress</p>定义来源     <p>十七大报告</p>例句     <p>1. 以健全民主集中制为重点加强制度建设，以完善惩治和预防腐败体系为重点加强反腐倡廉建设，使党始终成为立党为公、执政为民，求真务实、改革创新，艰苦奋斗、清正廉洁，富有活力、团结和谐的马克思主义执政党。</p><p>1. Institutionally, we will emphasize improving democratic centralism. In enhancing the Party's capacity to fight corruption and uphold integrity we will focus on improving the institutions for punishing and preventing corruption. All this will enable the Party to remain a ruling Marxist party that is built for the public interests and exercises governance for the people; a party that is realistic, pragmatic and committed to reform and innovation; a party that is hardworking and clean; and a party that is full of vigor and enjoys solidarity and harmony.</p>
惩防并举	惩防并举       【英】<h1>to combine punishment and prevention</h1>译文来源     <p>Report to the 18th National Congress of the Communist Party of China</p>定义来源     <p>十八大报告</p>例句     <p>1. 要坚持中国特色反腐倡廉道路，坚持标本兼治、综合治理、惩防并举、注重预防方针，全面推进惩治和预防腐败体系建设，做到干部清正、政府清廉、政治清明。</p><p>1. We should keep to the Chinese-style path of combating corruption and promoting integrity. We should persist in combating corruption in an integrated way, addressing both its symptoms and root causes, and combining punishment and prevention, with emphasis on the latter. We should advance in an all-around way the establishment of a system of combating corruption through both punishment and prevention and see to it that officials are honest, the government is clean, and political integrity is upheld.</p>

This strengthened the role of the fiscal and taxation systems in accelerating the change of the growth model.</p>

我国发展的阶段性特征	我国发展的阶段性特征       【英】<h1>the essential features of the development in the current stage</h1>译文来源     <p>Report to the 18th National Congress of the Communist Party of China</p>定义来源     <p>十八大报告</p>例句     <p>1. 前进过程中，我们战胜突如其来的非典疫情，认真总结我国发展实践，准确把握我国发展的阶段性特征，及时提出和全面贯彻科学发展观等重大战略思想，开拓了经济社会发展的广阔空间。</p><p>1. While we were on the way, we overcame the unexpected outbreak of the severe acute respiratory syndrome (SARS). On the basis of reviewing China's development practices, we gained a good understanding of the essential features of its development in the current stage, set forth in a timely way major strategic thinking including the Scientific Outlook on Development, and have fully applied it, and thus greatly expanded the space for economic and social development.</p>

We will conduct friendly exchanges with political parties and organizations of other countries and encourage people's congresses, national and local committees of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference, local governments and people's organizations to increase overseas exchanges so as to consolidate the social foundation for enhancing China's relations with other countries.</p>
我国社会主义政党制度	我国社会主义政党制度       【英】<h1>the Chinese socialist system of political parties</h1>译文来源     <p>Report at 16th Party Congress</p>定义来源     <p>十六大报告</p>例句     <p>1. 坚持“长期共存、互相监督、肝胆相照、荣辱与共”的方针，加强同民主党派合作共事，更好地发挥我国社会主义政党制度的特点和优势。</p><p>1. We should uphold the principle of "long-term coexistence, mutual supervision, treating each other with all sincerity and sharing weal and woe", step up our cooperation with the democratic parties and better display the features and advantages of the Chinese socialist system of political parties.</p>
